Manager Response: Carol C,  We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience not only with us, but your fellow travelers. We really pride ourselves on customer service and it's exciting to see that the entire staff was able to leave a lasting impression. Sarah is a key part of our team and we're extremely happy to have her! This review will be shared with the entire staff to ensure they are motivated to keep providing this type of service. Thank you so much for you business and choosing to stay with us here in Cypress.   By the way, putting a hanging area in the laundry room is such a great idea! We appreciate the suggestion, and we hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: My girlfriend and I wanted to take a quick trip from San Diego to use our Disneyland season passes but not break the bank by staying in a Disneyland hotel this time around. The location was perfect, just a quick 15 minute drive down Katella and we were at the park with money to spend and lots of fun to have. The Courtyard, although being part of a larger chain, exceeded our expectations in customer service, accommodations, and hotel operations: from housekeeping, to The Bistro, and beginning and ending with the front desk.  In particular the Guest Services Manager, Jimmy Hendrix, delivered on all levels in making our traditional stay an unforgettable one.  Being a hotel in Anaheim without the bells and whistles, this property does a superb job in catering to the unique needs of
Manager Response: Charlie G,  We really appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay with us, we're so glad to hear how much you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to exceed your expectations! It's great to be able to stay so close to Disneyland, yet far enough away from all the traffic and chaos the amusement parks can bring. But it is the happiest place on earth, it's awesome to hear we were able to add to that! We're working extremely hard on providing the best customer service in the area, and it's great to hear this type of feedback!   Thank you again for choosing to stay with us, and we hope to see you again for your next trip to the area!

Summary Heading: Good, quiet hotel in the heart of business district. Kid friendly.
Summary: My family and i were in town for a funeral. I initially booked this hotel for 3 nights through a thrid party website and received a decent price. Our check in was quick and seamless. I was pleasantly surprised to find that the room was a bit larger than most hotel rooms I've stayed in. It made our stay very comfortable. The hotel is located in the middle of a business district which made for a quiet nights. No partyers here as most people staying were on business. I saw a few families. There is no free breakfast as with other chains.  But the is a bistro in the main lobby which serves breakfast with Starbucks coffee in the morning. That is open until 10am. The bistro opens up again in the evening. There is a bar with happy hour starting at 5p. The dinner menu is basic serving
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to complete a review and rate your recent experience with us. We're excited to hear how much you not only enjoyed the service and amenities but the location as well! It's a great, safe area that is perfect for your morning runs, or even a walk to the many shops and restaurants in the area! The next door addition of Noodles & co. as well as the Udoko Caf√© has added some more great options outside of the variety that The Bistro already offers, and variety is always great!! Being that we are located in a business district and just outside all of the chaos of the amusement parks it does make for a good nights rest and its great to hear you and your family were so comfortable you stayed an extra night!   All in all we're really happy to hear you loved your stay, and we hope to see you next time your travels bring you back to Cypress!

Summary: This relatively new hotel is quiet, clean, with great service. There are many places to eat nearby. It's only a 10-15 min drive to Disneyland which much more reasonable prices and less traffic. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I feel thats the number one thing all guests look for, location location location. We are perfectly placed in between many restaurants, which most are walking distance. Our shuttle can also drop off guests to any restaurants in a 5 mile radius. The drive to Disneyland is a straight shot on Katella and you dont have to pay the Disneyland hotel prices for the same, if not better service and experience. Thank you for your business and the staff and I hope to see you again in the future.   Thank you   Rick Garcia

Summary: Love Courtyard Cypress! Our room was immaculately clean, no funky smell. Very comfy bed, white, soft sheets -- I always had a good night sleep. The heater/aircon works well, sometimes too toasty so we turn it down a little. A nice cleaning lady comes to tidy up our room every morning, very generous with toiletry replenishment (we're 3 in the room). Appreciate that the staff who checked us in placed other members of the family in rooms close by, so it's convenient for us to see/visit each other. Young kids enjoyed the heated pool. Restaurants are walking distance like Wendy's and a Hawaiian place.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for leaving such a nice review on your most recent stay in Cypress. The team works really hard in making every guest experience memorable. It makes us happy to hear that you had a good experience with multiple departments. I will be sharing your comments with the staff, thank you so much for you review and your business. Please come see us again in the future.   Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary Heading: Clean, kid friendly and excellent hosts for our soccer teams
Summary: Room was spotless, good size, pool and jacuzzi were great. The lobby is perfect. Lots of room, good taste and very clean. Lobby has starbucks drinks and a small bar serving alcoholic drinks. Excellent. There is even a work out room and a laundry room which we used to dry the kids clothes after the rainy soccer tournament. Breakfast was great for an early buffet style breakfast. The staff were very tolerant of all the kids - lots of kids! Multiple events going on in the area so soccer, hockey tournament were occurring and also a 5k. Friendly people in lobby too. I have stayed here a couple times and will return. They even had a basketball hoop in the parking lot so the kids could play ball.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Dan,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a nice review for your most recent stay in Cypress. I am glad to hear your team had such a great time during your time here. The sales and front desk team do a great job in planning for the big tournament weekends, so I am happy to hear everything went as planned. We hope to see you and your team in Cypress again in the near future.   Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, large clean room, COMFY bed!
Summary: We had a really quick stay here for an athletic event at the base in Los Alamitos.  The staff who checked us in were really friendly and check in was easy.  The room was larger than expected with a sitting room and bedroom separated by french doors.  The sitting room had a TV, desk and a "wet bar" with a microwave and small fridge.  The bathroom was clean and plenty big with a nice shower.  The bedroom had a big bed and a TV.  The bed was VERY comfortable!  We were really happy with our stay and slept well before our races the next day.
Manager Response: Hello Karen,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a nice review. We strive to provide the best customer service possible here at the Courtyard in Cypress. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your room and the amenities we offer. We really hope to see you again in the near future.   Thank you  Rick Garcia General Manager

Summary: The stay at this hotel was great for us!  We were here for my husbands work.  The hotel is close enough that we did day trips when touring.  Hotel is clean, comfortable, convenient, and quiet.  Silvia in the cafe was there every morning and was the best employee there!!  She went out of her way to make us feel at home.  One morning they had already closed but she went ahead and got my coffee and I paid her the next day!    The only bad thing was that the cafe was only open for breakfast and dinner.   Also the workout room is limited and was very hot every time I went in.
Manager Response: Hello,  I want to first and foremost thank you for choosing the Courtyard in Cypress in your most recent stay. We are very lucky to have the many great staff members that make all our guests feel at home. I will make sure to share your comments to them. Thank you so much for your business, please come back and see us again.  Thank you   Rick Garcia

Summary: My husband and I were traveling with our son-in-law and grandchildren and stayed at this Courtyard. That evening our 13 yr. old granddaughter started her period for the first time. Our daughter (her mother) passed away from cancer a year ago and this was one of those milestones that we promised to handle with extra care. But of course we had no supplies. It was 8pm and the kids were all showered and in pj's, so I went to the front desk and a wonderful girl actually put together a darling little gift bag with pads, tampons and even box of M&Ms! My granddaughter was embarrassed, relieved, and overjoyed by the attention she received. And here's the best part. Someone called her room to make sure she had everything she needed. Later my husband and I got the same call in our room and
Manager Response: Good Evening Candy,  This brings a smile to my face and I am extremely proud of the staff to taking care of you and your family during your most recent stay at the Courtyard in Cypress. I will make sure to share your comments with the staff and thank you so much for sharing them. We take pride in serving all of our guests with the best customer service possible. Thank you for your business. Please come see us again in the near future, we look forward to having all of you back.   thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary: I stayed at the hotel the night before Christmas Eve. Upon arrival, I was impressed with the design of the lobby and was quickly greeted by the front desk staff, who was very friendly. They had me checked in very quickly and up to my room in no time. The room was great, and more importantly very clean.  The next morning, I had no issues using the lobby computers to print my amusement park passes.   Overall, the hotel was great; very clean and the staff was very friendly. If you are in the area, I recommend staying at this Marriott.
Manager Response: Hello Evan,  Thank you for choosing the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress. We strive to provide the best guest experience possible to all of our guest and I know the staff will be happy to hear the comments you have left on your most recent stay. Thank you for your business and please come see us again in the future.                                                                      Thank you  Rick Garcia General Manager

Summary: The perfect choice for any visit, or in my case a last minute business trip. Front desk was friendly, kind and helpful. Room was clean and booked easily with a short notice. Service was awesome! Will stay again :)
Manager Response: Hello Adamian107,  Here at the Courtyard in Cypress, we strive to provide the best guest experience possible. I am glad you had such a great experience while staying at our property. We cant wait to have you back in the future, please come see us again.  Thank you   Rick Garcia General Manager

Summary: It was our first visit in anaheim cali and we stayed here for 5 days. I was very pleased with the location, friendly and professional staff members. The room was very clean and comfortable. Overall this was an exceptional experience and I will be staying in this hotel again when i come visit Disneyland again..
Manager Response: Hello Isabelle,  We are glad to hear that you had a great experience while in Cypress. We strive to provide the best customer experience possible for all of our guests and we are excited to hear about yours. Location is such a great sell point for our hotel since we are so close to Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm. Not to mention within a short drive of some great restaurants and shopping centers. We appreciate you taking the time to leave such a great review and thank you for your business, we look forward to seeing you again in the future.   Thank you Rick Garcia

Summary Heading: Excellent! Will definitely stay here again!
Summary: We stayed at this hotel from December 29, 2016 until January 3, 2017. We were on a family vacation to Disneyland and Universal Studios, etc. Our stay was highly satisfactory! The front desk staff were very pleasant, helpful and knowledgeable. We had a lot of questions about the area and activities we can do nearby and they were happy to help out. The room was clean, spacious and comfortable. We had a king room with a sofa bed, which was perfect for us -- a family with 2 young kids. Parking was free! And plenty. Pool is heated. Kids loved that they could swim outdoors at night when it's 50¬∞ F. Jacuzzi was nice. Elevator was fast! Location is great -- it's in a quiet, tree-lined area. Walking distance to restaurants. We got 20% off at El Torito (right next door) just by showing
Manager Response: Hello Laddie,  First and foremost thank you so much for such a kind review. I will make sure to share your comments with the team members. Location location location! That's what it is about right? Staying at the Courtyard in Cypress is a perfect location because we are so close to the restaurants, shops, and main attractions. We are glad that you were able to have such a good time in Anaheim with your family. We cant wait to have you back in the future.   Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary Heading: Stay at the Courtyard Cypress Anaheim /Orange County
Summary: The Hotel is conveniently located in Cypress/Anaheim  near many shopping places and restaurants. Most of these places need a car to drive to. There's nothing you can reach in a walking distance except for a Mexican Restaurant.  The Hotel and room were clean. However I thought that the room was small in size.  The hallways and elevator carpets had stains and should be cleaner.  Parking was on sight and it is free  There's only one negative thing i has experience and that was the traffic noise from a nearby road. This had me change the room location , however this didn't solve the issue. I had to leave the Hotel the next morning since I didn't get a good sleep due to the traffic noise all night long.  I recommend that the windows should be upgraded and to have a better noise level
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to leave a review on your most recent stay at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress. I want to take the time to thank you for your business and for choosing our hotel while staying in the Orange County/Cypress area. We strive to provide the best experience possible to all of our guests. I am happy that our service was up to your standard on your most recent stay and we welcome you back anytime, please come see us again in the future.  Thank you,  Rick Garcia General Manager

Summary: This was a last minute booking but we found the hotel at much better price than the nearest motel which we had ended up into that night. Check-in and front desk staff was friendly. Room was cozy & queen beds were comfortable for a good night sleep. The most surprising of all was the morning breakfast in downstairs restaurant in the lobby. The Sunrise omlet with bread was super yummy - Kids and wife enjoyed it and prices were exceptionally reasonable compared to what you would pay for a comparable food outside. This was our second Courtyard stay in one week and Overall it was great!
Manager Response: First and foremost thank you for choosing the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. The bistro is popular across the Courtyard brand and our staff takes pride in serving a great product. We appreciate the positive feedback and we welcome you back anytime.   Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary Heading: Spent Eve/Christmas at a awesome Hotel
Summary: Checked in on Christmas Eve. The lobby is very well set up with a bar area, food, store and incredible sitting area. My first visit here and certainly not my last. They have a Gym, Pool, Banquet. Meeting room, Starbucks. The room remind me of the Las Vegas Hotels in a awesome layout. Our room was on the 7th floor, very comfy king bed, Sofa, Plenty of blankets and pillow.  I saw a sign they also offer boardrooms like scrabble. Our room also had a coffee maker with coffee, mini refrigerator, Desk,  Nice size tb on a swivel to watch from bed. Paul Mitchel hair products in bath room. Did i mention a very friendly staff. This location close to  many Restaurants, Race Track, close shopping. I highly recommend this be your next stay  when in the area of Los Alamitos, Cypress, Garden
Manager Response: Hello,  We hope you had an amazing Christmas trip. Thank you for taking the time out of your day to leave such a nice review. We strive to provide the best customer experience to all of our guests and I am glad your stay was up to your expectations. Please come see us again and Happy New Year to you and yours.  Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary: The all night self service mini bar is very convenient for guests who wants to extend their after the bar closing socialization.  Plus the area is situated in a place where other guests are or will not be bothered by those who are still socializing.  I suggest that the bar area should have an after hours bottle opener for the beer drinkers.  But in all the place was a good place for groups to stay for the price.
Manager Response: Hello Alejandro,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review on your most recent stay at the Courtyard in Cypress. We appreciate the feedback you have left and for future reference, after the bistro closes you can always stop by the front desk to open any wine or beer bottles. Thank you for your business and we hope to see you again in the future.  Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary Heading: Top tier Courtyard, close to full service amenities
Summary: This Courtyard is sometimes a value play because it's a bit away from Long Beach Airport and off the major freeways. In return you get free parking and a midrise property that is clean, quiet, and recognizes its Marriott Rewards members.   This is one of the very few Courtyards in which I've been upgraded to a suite as a Platinum member. The king suite was very similar in setup to a typical SpringHill Suites room, with only an odd heavy bathroom door sticking out into the hallway to mar the flow.   Decor is up to date, bedding is clean and the bed very comfortable. Marriotts still don't get TV size well - it's probably a 37-incher occupying a space in the bedroom that could easily accommodate a 50-incher - but the channel selection was reasonable.   At lobby level, the Bistro
Manager Response: Hello,  First and foremost thank you choosing the Courtyard By Marriott on your most recent stay in Cypress. We really appreciate all the positive feedback you left in your review and I will ensure to share with the managers and staff. The great perk to staying with our particular Courtyard is the larger bistro and available upgrades for our Marriott Reward members. Please come see us again in the future we would love to have you back.   Thank you   Rick Garcia

Summary: But I saved a few hundred bucs driving 6 miles. Hotel was clean and neat. Yes is not within walking distance to Disney but I saved a ton and it was in a nice area. Maybe it was geared more toward business travelers. The bistro downstairs was also good.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for taking the time today to leave such a great review. I must agree that the Courtyard Marriott in Cypress definitely has everything you need as a leisure traveler. You don't have to pay the high Disneyland prices and were only 6 miles from the park along with free parking and WiFi. We strive to procide the best guest expereience possible and I am glad we were able to do that for you. Please come stay with us again in the future.   Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary: We stayed at Courtyard Cypress Anaheim and was pleased with our 4 night stay. Nice quite rooms, lots of free parking, comfortable beds and great water pressure in shower. 7 miles from Disneyland. Staff was great giving us an early check/in.
Manager Response: Hello Randy,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review on your most recent stay at the courtyard by Marriott Cypress. Location is such a huge perk we offer to our guests. Not only are we 7 miles from Disneyland, we are 5 miles from Knott's Berry Farm and within walking distance of some great restaurants and shops. Please come see us again in the future.   Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary: We stayed at this hotel in late Oct. and had a great stay.  It was very clean and I am picky too!  Felix that works at the front desk was really awesome!  He was genuinely interested if you had a nice day and acted like he really cared!  Highly recommend this place.  The Bistro serves great food too, the breakfast is really good and you get your money's worth!  We will be back again!
Manager Response: Hello Michelle,  Thank you for taking the time out of your day to leave such a honest a nice review. We strive to provide the best customer service possible. Felix really sets the bar at the front desk and we are glad to have him on board. I will make sure to share your words with him. Please come see us again in the future.   Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary: I needed a reasonable price hotel near my family, with good accommodations. I know the Marriott brand well and they are usually good hotels. The Courtyard Cypress is not the best but it was comfortable and clean. The staff wasn't the most cordial but they were professionals. I do not think I will return, unless I have no other choice.
Manager Response: Hello Joel,  We strive to provide the best service and experience possible here at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress. We would love to see you again in the future so we can provide that great guest experience that we know we are capable of providing for all our current, returning, and future guests.   Thank you   Rick Garcia

Summary: We drove from Vegas and arrived around 1:30pm I knew we were a little early but I just wanted to check to see if we could get in early. The lady said that there were no rooms ready yet but she could pre check me in. So that was fine. I asked what was good to eat around the area she gave me a list of places which was awesome. When we did check in the rooms were so nice and comfortable I would love to return. The only down fall was I guess there was a party going on in the ball room and our room was located right above it and the party went on till about midnight it was hard to get pass all the bass but I didn't want to call to the front desk and ruin someone's party but it was hard to sleep through other then that our stay was great and I'll defiantly return one.
Manager Response: First and foremost, thank you for taking the time to leave a review on your most recent stay at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress. We work hard to make sure all of our guests enjoy their stays while staying in the hotel. I am glad we were able to get you recommendations on all the great eats within driving distance of the hotel. Please come see us again in the future.   Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary: Booked 2 rooms for 3 nights, stayed two.  When we checked in at 3 only one room ready.  When we went to room there was water pouring out of light fixture.  Staff did repair quickly.  Rooms were not cleaned until late afternoon.  After being out all day you would like to come back to relax.  Hallways and elevator could be vacuumed.  .  Bistro restaurant is similar to fast food.  They advertise shuttle service, when we asked for it we were told there was no one to drive it.  Also no restaurants within walking distance except for one Mexican restaurant.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review on your most recent stay. Here at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress we strive to provide the best guest experience possible. Please stop by the front desk next time because we have some great local recommendations that are within walking distance and some that are drive-able as well. Please come see us again in the future for a positive experience.   Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary: I have to say the stay has been an amazing . I also have to say Felix understands customer service and how to treat people .. I was total blown away with the way the check in was as well the following up call 10 mins later to see if everything was great.. PS give Felix a raise
Manager Response: Hello Sandy,  Thank you for you kind comments. I will make sure to share your comments with Felix. We strive to deliver the best guest experience possible in the Anaheim area and I am extremely happy that we were able to provide a great guest experience for you while you were here in Cypress. Please come see us again in the future!   Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary: My family and I made visit to Disney Land for their trick or treat special, we chose to stay at the Courtyard Marriott in Cypress, the location was perfect, conveniently close and just outside the usual craziness that can be found closer to the park. and what made things even better, was the way we were greeted upon check-in, which, by the way, we were able to do early, and that was nice, because it was a very hot day, the early check-in allowed us enough time to hit the pool before heading to the Disney, and that was a hit with my 8 yr. old daughter. We found the room very much to our liking, especially my daughter, she got her own queen size bed. The hospitality was 5 star, the staff was very pleasant and accommodating, and as I mentioned it was hot , when we entered our room,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review. I will make sure to share your review with the staff, which i know they will appreciate. We strive to provide best guest experience for all of our guests that walk in and out our doors on a day to day basis and I am glad that we were able to provide that experience for you and your family. We hope to see you and your family again in the future. Thank you.  Rick Garcia

Summary: The staff are extremely friendly and helpful.  They are professional yet just laid back enough to make it feel like home.  The rooms are well maintained and comfortable.  The location. Is close to many great restaurants yet the in house bistro has some delicious options! Be sure to ask for Felix!
Manager Response: First and foremost, I would like to thank you for choosing the Courtyard by Marriott on your most recent stay  in Cypress. We strive to provide the best customer service to all of our guests. Location is such an great perk and great for our guests because we are so close to all major freeways, restaurants, shops, and attractions. I will share your great review with the staff and I know we will all be happy to see you again in the future.   Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary: The Courtyard by Marriott, was a wonderful place to stay.  Close to everything, Disneyland, Angels stadium, Long Beach, LA, Shopping and my work while I was there.  I would highly recommend staying here, the staff is very pleasant, helpful, and available.  Rooms are clean and pleasantly decorated.  My bed was very cozy, no noise overall.  The Bistro food is very good, staff was quick to serve you as well.  Parking was sufficient.  Fitness center, laundry and pool area was nice.  Truly enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: Hello Carol,  Thank you for taking the time out of your busy day to leave such a nice review. We appreciate you choosing the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress as your hotel of chose when coming into the area. Please come see us again in the future, it was a pleasure to have you.  Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary Heading: Good place to stay away from the theme park crowds
Summary: We have family not far from here and decided a quieter location to relax would work best and were pleased with this Courtyard.  Friendly staff, plenty of free parking, and a nice pool and hot tub were all appreciated.  Good sized room with a strong AC, too.
Manager Response: I would like to take the time and say thank you for leaving a review on your most recent stay. I would have to agree that Cypress is very quiet and relaxing. We strive to provide the best guest service possible for all of our guests and i am glad your experience was positive. We welcome you back and hope to see you again in the near future.   Thank you  Rick Garcia General Manager 714-827-1010

Summary: The staff at the hotel were very friendly and helpful. I asked the clerk for directions to a restaurant to meet some family members. He explained to me how to get there and even printed out the directions for me. Great customer service. The rooms were very nice and clean. Hotel is very close to places to eat and close to freeways. Our stay at the Courtyard By Marriot in Cypress Ca was excellent. We will be returning next time we are in the area.
Manager Response: First and foremost, thank you for your business during your stay in Cypress. We appreciate the honest and kind feedback. We strive to provide the best customer service and guest experience to every single person walking through our front doors. I will make sure to share your comments with the staff and we all hope to see you again in the future.   Thank you   Rick Garcia

Summary: This is an exceptionally nice Courtyard! The property is well taken care of and the staff was really helpful. It has a great exercise room, with a variety of machines and tons of space. The front desk was even on top of the mobile checkin process, which was appreciated.
Manager Response: First and foremost, thank you your kind review and also for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress. We appreciate your business.  It was a pleasure to have you stay with us. We take pride in offering the top guest service experience to all of our guests. Please come see us again in the future.   Rick Garcia  General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for one evening. Hotel was clean, comfortable and spacious. Lot of dining options nearby. The heated pool is nice to use during the day, but during the evenings it's not as hot as you would like. Overall, this was a great option and convenient to Disneyland as it sits on Katella(just up the street a few miles away). I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Location is one of the many perks to staying at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress. Thank you for being our guest on your most recent stay. We appreciate the feedback and please come see us again in the future.   Rick Garcia General Manager

Summary Heading: This Hotel Makes It Easy for the Business Traveler
Summary: I stayed here after a long day of work at a client facility.  This place made it easy for me, which is what I needed.  Quick check in.  Decent food at The Bistro.  Clean room.  Effortless.  Easy access to 605.  Now, there aren't any fancy restaurants nearby (at least I didn't find any) but that was fine.  Check out easy, too.
Manager Response: Hello Charles,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to leave a review about your most recent stay  at the Courtyard in Cypress. We appreciate the feedback and most of all we appreciate your business. Please stop by our front desk on your next stay and we would love to give you all the local recommendations for food in our area. There are some great food spots very close to the hotel.   Thank you Rick Garcia General Manager

Summary: We were with a group that stayed at this hotel from July 5 - July 12. Everyone from the front desk, housekeeping, Bistro, and beyond were fabulous! The a/c in our room wasn't quite working 100% (for the first few days), but maintenance finally got it blowing cold air. Any request was readily seen to. The hotel has a great lobby area to relax. We felt quite at home. We used the gym, guest laundry, and pool/hot tub. The food is really good, too. We had breakfast, dinner, and cocktails throughout our stay. Lots of options for any meal plan! Also very close to other dining options.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Jeanie,  Thank you for such a kind and honest review. Thank you so much for your business and for letting us know about the issues you had during your stay. I am extremely happy that we were able to take care of those issues in such a timely manner. We would love to have you back in the future. Hope to see you soon!  Thank you Rick Garcia General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel. Not close to much.
Summary: The hotel is clean, and the staff is friendly. My A/C unit quit working in the middle of the night, but the staff took care of it while I was out for the day. The hotel is not very close to anything exciting, but they do have a lounge. Restaurant next door was decent.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to leave us some feedback on your most recent stay. I am glad we were able to take care of your issues during your stay. I do suggest stopping by our front desk the next time you stay with us. We have so many great recommendations for great restaurants in the area. Next time we will point you in the right direction so please come see us again in the future.   Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary: After a long day of driving down the Pacific Coast Highway, this hotel was a wonderful treat.  Nice modern lobby.  Nice suite room with separate living room with pull out sofa.  Furnishings well nice and modern and the room has lots of outlets.  There is a minifridge and microwave in the room as well.  Exactly what you would expect from a marriott property.  The hotel itself seems to be in a business district/area, so you must drive a bit to find any fast food or restaurants.  We stayed here and drove to Disneyland in about 15 minutes.  The hotel itself was about 45 minutes from LAX.  Please note that 45 minutes in LA was equivalent to about 17 miles or so.  We would stay here again if needed, but if going to Disneyland or venturing everyday into LA, I would probably stay a bit
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a great trip and what better way then to be able to relax in our comfortable suites. Thank you for taking the time out of your day to give us some feedback it is greatly appreciated. We hope to see you again in the future. Thank you for your business.  Rick Garcia  General Manager

Summary: Great hospitality, great people!!!  After the airlines found a way to cancel my flight they topped it off by losing my luggage. At 1am, the night auditor Italia and house-rep Jorge R went the extra mile to make sure I was ready for my meetings first thing in the morning.  Great Job!!!
Manager Response: Craig,  I will be sharing your kind words with Italia and Jorge. We are really happy to have those two on our team and i'm glad they were able to help you out during your stay. We strive to provide the best guest experience possible and i am glad you were able to experience that first hand. Please come see us again in the future.   Thank you  Rick Garcia

Summary: Everyone was very helpful. We called several times for extra items, once even late in the evening, and the staff was always very nice and delivered what we needed with a smile. They have 24 hour Starbucks which was icing on the cake!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We are always pleased to hear from our guests and appreciate your kind words. They will be passed on to our staff!

Summary: Usually my regular place, stay here on business about once a month a week at a time. That is, unless they're sold out which has happened a couple of times this summer, then I stay just 2 blocks away at the Residence Inn. The entire staff is very friendly, Professional and show a genuine concern for your satisfaction. I've had a few issues in the past and they're always prompt to remedy or repair. I want to mention the young ladies in the Bistro, sorry cannot recall their names but they are a great staff always smiling and thanking you, making sure you have what you need. After a long day, it's nice to return and experience their kindness.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty, staying with us every month at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We appreciate your comments and will make sure they are passed on to our staff. The young ladies in the Bistro are- daytime Sylvia, Sara, Jackie- evening- Francia, Mary and Darshana-  Again, thank you!

Summary: We have stayed at this property on three separate occasions and each time has been wonderful. On our last visit, we checked in late Thursday night and were greeted by Italia. Her exemplary customer service was appreciated. Rooms are always clean, the food counter including coffee bar is good and open late! We look forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty and taking the time to write these nice comments about your stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We do have a star onboard with Italia and will make sure this is passed on to her as well as the entire staff.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel with super friendly staff
Summary: I stayed here on a business trip the week of 7/26/16.  The property is very clean, the rooms are all updated and the staff is super friendly.  Everyone from the front desk to the Bistro staff make you feel at ease and are happy you are there.  This is my new go-to hotel when in Cypress area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great comments regarding your stay here a the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We are extremely proud of our staff and we will share this with them.

Summary: The Courtyard Marriott Cypress was a great friendly place to stay. We stayed here for 5 nights. As a previous hotel Mgr I would say the staff was accommodating and gave excellent service! Specially the night Auditor and morning Supervisor. (Are we allowed to give names) Rooms were neat and clean. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your comments about your stay here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We appreciate you point of view as a past hotel manager and hope you visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Clean, nice rooms and an accommodating staff
Summary: Very pleased with all the amenities. The staff is incredibly helpful and the rooms are spacious and clean. Breakfast was was good each morning, with a lot of options. A Starbucks is in the lobby. Nice pool and close proximity to beach and not too far from other area attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. Your comments will be passed on to our staff and we hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Have just spent 3 nights at the hotel. The rooms are spacious and generally clean (aside from the obligatory hairs in various parts of the bathroom). The air con unit in the room is old and noisy and I found I needed to turn it off at night. Other than that slept ok. The average is the breakfast buffet. Very limited and from my perspective not befitting the Marriott standard Ive been accustomed to elsewhere. Overall it gets the job done but check alternatives.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. I am thinking you might have been staying with s team which we had included a team breakfast buffet. We will discuss this with the staff.

Summary: I can not express enough how wonderful all my interactions were with every single employee I came in contact with. It is by far the best experience I have ever had staying at a hotel. They were so cheerful and happy it really makes a difference. The hotel was clean, well maintained, very comfortable beds and bedding. Paul Mitchell Shampoo,  conditioner and lotion. I loved the 24 hour starbucks, and we ordered breakfast in the lobby they packaged it very nice to take back to our room it was fantastic!! You could see how all the employees get along so nice and help each other out, they never looked stressed, It really was a very relaxing stay,we will be back!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard Cypress. We are always pleased to hear that our employees are doing such a great job. This will be passed on to them and we hope you visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Always reliable, clean, convenient, and friendly
Summary: I stay frequently at this property.  The staff is always courteous and efficient.  I feel safe and comfortable.  The lobby bar is a good place to have meetings.  The front desk staff will take me by shuttle to my office a few blocks away. Every member of the staff is friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience regarding your stay at the Courtyard Cypress.  Your comments will be passed on to our staff and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I stay at this Courtyard once or twice every few months because it's a mile from my office.  The staff always remembers me and treats me like family, which is nice, since I'm a working mother and away from my family.  The rooms are nice, the breakfast is very good, and the service is impeccable.  I won't stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest at our Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We are always  pleased to hear from our guests that they are well taken care of by our staff. Safe Travels!

Summary: 4th of July weekend stay at Courtyard Marriott    cypress was perfect.I Was greeted   right away by Felix he made sure I had the perfect stay .I had  booked   regular  room and I was up graded   to suite ,Also for been a Marriott   member I was able to get a late check out from my stay ,Definitely   booking my next trip here best, Room RATES and guests  service
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review in regards to your stay here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. Felix is definitely a great asset to this hotel and we do receive a lot of compliments on his customer service. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great staff and a better than average property
Summary: The staff are super friendly and helpful. The property is good. Rooms are clean and bathrooms are not too small / not huge.  Overall a pretty quiet hotel. Located within an office complex so not a lot of highway or main road noise.  The lobby is very spacious and lots of seating areas.  It is close to grocery stores and restaurants  Overall; when I need to be in the cypress /Anaheim area... This will be a top choice based on pricing with the other Marriott properties in the area
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard Cypress. It is always good to hear from our guests and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I attended a 40th birthday party nd was very happy with the service provided by the catering manager Sammy Toa and her staff. Food was very delicious... I would definitely book my next event at this location. Thank you for your service!
Manager Response: Thank you for writing your response regarding the party you attended here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. Please let us know if you are planning anything in the future. You will be working with our Catering Manager, Sammy Toa.

Summary: My little sister and family gave me a surprise 40th birthday party here. When I arrive to hotel the staff was so nice especially the hotel catering manager Sammy Toa, and she made herself available for the our guest making sure everything was going well before she got off work. Once I enter the ballroom everything was so beautiful such as the decorations was so elegant and the food taste so amazing. Days after my party my family and friends are still talking about what a wonderful time they had celebrating my birthday and the food was the best. I will recommend anyone who is looking for a place to have a celebration to book it here with Sammy Toa. Ps. Can you please tell Sammy Toa the Catering Manager she is awesome.
Manager Response: Happy Birthday!! We will definitely pass the message on to Sammy Toa that she is awesome- I am sure that has been done already on many occasions.  Thank you for letting us know and hope they surprise you again next year at the Courtyard Cypress.

Summary: My family and I hosted  a  surprise 40th b-day party for my sister. The  hotel catering manager Sammy Toa and the staff were amazing, everything turned out  beautifully. I was aloud to set up my own little touches  to decorate the ballroom to make my vision for my sister's party come to life. The food was also amazing. I went with the buffet style dinner with the chicken marsala, tri tip, rice, grilled fresh vegetables, mashed potatoes with gravy, and salad. Every bit of it was delicious. I also had a cash bar because what's a 40th b-day party without some adult beverages, with that said, our bartender Alfonso made the best drinks that kept my guest buying more lol. By the end of the night my party guess could not stop commenting on how everything turned out so well. I would
Manager Response: I heard all about that surprise birthday party and how everyone was having a great time. Sammy is such a wonderful assset to our hotel.  She let you utilize your very own personal touch. Thank you for having the party at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress and Sammy will definitely be recognized for a job well done.

Summary: I liked the full width window in the bedroom. Captured some beautiful sunsets on a couple of the evenings.   I stay in a lot of Marriotts and did notice a difference of the gift bag and the offer of something from the market. And did notice the note attached to the gift bag. That is was a different touch. And it was appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review regarding your stay at the Courtyard Cypress. We do appreciate our guests and it is so nice to see you took notice. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Staff at all level had professional attitude and attentive to our needs throughout our stay.  Location of this hotel was within distance to the places I needed to do in that area.  We found the room very comfortable and clean.  Definitely a return place.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write this review in regards to your stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We take great pride in our well trained, professional staff and they definitely enjoy interacting with the guests. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: We always use this location as our go-to hotel, whether in town visiting family/friends, taking care of personal affairs or even going to Disneyland to stay away from all the crazy. Rooms are spacious, comfy and meticulously clean. Check in was smooth and associates are welcoming and friendly. Happy hour at the bistro from 5-7 was a nice touch with some inexpensive beers after a busy day. Wherever we were we were always greeted and asked if we needed anything. Hotel centrally located and next door they are building a food court venue so that will be great for even more choices while you stay here. Will definitely return here and only here next time in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting the Courtyard Cypress. We appreciate your business and thrilled to hear all these great comments. This will be shared with our staff and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Amazing hotel, quiet and clean!I Very organized, professional and friendly staff, our room was ready before check-in time and the pool and jacuzzi area was amazing!!! Perfect mini vacation for my husband and I! Thank you, we will be back with our family for our next vacation!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard Cypress. We truly appreciate it when a guest takes the time to write comments about their stay with us. We take great pride in our hotel and the staff is one of our greatest assets. We hope to see you again on your next vacation.

Summary: First hotel I had stayed at that sells actual Starbucks coffee. For me that was amazing, being a caffeine addict, especially Starbucks coffee addict, and all. Very convenient. Love that they have a restaurant/cafe, the food is amazing. Apart from coffee and the food this hotel is very affordable, the rooms are very clean, the staff is great and very helpful. I would recommend this hotel to my family and friends, especially when they come to disneyland, which is another great thing this hotel has it is close to disneyland and knotts berry farm. Totally recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review in regards to your stay here at the Courtyard Cypress. You are right, the Starbucks in our Bistro is a great addition to our menu. We hope to see you here again and appreciate your comments.

Summary Heading: The Most Comfortable, Accommodating Stay, at a Very Affordable Rate!
Summary: I stayed three nights at the Courtyard Marriott in Cypress, CA so I could rest from a surgery I just had. The staff was very welcoming and pleasant, and made the check-in process quick and very simple. The Bistro and The Market offered anything I needed in terms of dining, snacks, and any items I may have forgotten to bring with me. The room was extremely clean in every way, and the beds were top-notch. The bathroom was large, modern, and simple The overall environment of the hotel gave me the sense of peace I needed, and I have already recommended this location to my family and friends for any of their travel needs. Additionally, this was the first time I lost something in the room (one of my cell phone accessories) and actually received it back. That was a huge thumbs up from
Manager Response: Thank you for writing such a thorough review regarding your stay at the Courtyard Cypress. Your comments will be passed on to our staff. We hope to see you here again soon.

Summary: We held our annual Classified School Employee Week (CSEW) breakfast celebration at the Courtyard Marriott in Cypress this past May.  Working with Sammy Toa and Sally Brayton was such a pleasure.  Sammy knew exactly what we wanted and made it happen, as did all their staff.  Everyone was so accommodating. The banquet room was beautifully set up and ready when I arrived early that morning.  We had approximately 100 attendees, and all said that the breakfast buffet was delicious!!!  Several of our attendees have already said they hope that we have next year's breakfast here. Thanks Sammy and Sally for helping to make our event one of our most memorable!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and booking your event at the Courtyard Cypress. Sammy Toa has been a great addition to our catering department and we both enjoyed working with you on this event. Along with your staff, we too hope you have your event here next year! Enjoy your summer!

Summary: Stayed here for business and it was obvious the staff knows what they're doing. They were all professional and courteous. The room was very nice and clean. The bar/cafe was perfect and the staff was so nice. I'll always stay here when I return for work for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Courtyard Cypress for your stay while conducting business. We hope you had the time to enjoy all that we have to offer. Our Bistro is a huge hit and our staff members have worked for us for many years and enjoy our guests. We will make sure they all read your comments. We hope you are back soon.

Summary: Their friendly front office staff was able to book my group a room last minute and did so with a sense of urgency. They provided us with near by entertainment brochures and suggested places to dine.  The room was impeccable and very refreshing could not have asked for more. They are close to Disney Land and I would highly recommend this place. I will be returning for a family trip in the near future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We are very proud of our employees and the time they take on detail to ensure our guests have everything they need to make their stay enjoyable. We appreciate you recommending us to others and hope to see you and your family back soon.

Summary: I recently stayed at the Courtyard on a mini vacation and was incredibly pleased with the customer service. I was accidentally charged for the room three times on my account and frantically called the hotel after my stay. Alicia Inman, the manager, was extremely kind and explained that the system had shut down the night of my stay. She explained that the front desk had already credited my account back and that i should see the money in my account within a few days. The money was back that evening. Her customer service and overall kindness towards me during this frantic period was greatly appreciated. The hotel was beautiful and the entire staff was warm and welcoming. Despite this mishap, i would definitely stay again and recommend friends and family here. Thanks again Alicia
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write this review. Alicia is our STAR- Front Office Manager and always takes the time to ensure that our guests are happy. We apologize for the mishap but glad it all worked out in a timely manner. Your comments will be passed on to our staff and management team.

Summary: It was just a wonderful experience with the room, staff and the delicious food at the  Bistro . It didn't seem to me like I was here for business felt like I was on a mini vacation. Will defiantly be back for a family vacation.
Manager Response: We understand how difficult it might be when you are away from home on business. It is always great when you enjoy your stay. We hope you can come back soon to the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress and have the time to enjoy our wonderful surroundings with Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm being minutes away.

Summary: This hotel was amazing! My husband and I loved how clean and fancy the overall hotel was. The staff were so friendly and everyone had a smile. We loved the 24 hour Starbucks! Yum! Our sleep was great and the bed was better than my own. After a 10 hour drive here, that was important! I will tell everyone to stop at this hotel.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write this wonderful review. We take great pride in this hotel and get a lot of compliments about the friendliness of our staff. We hope to see you again at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress.

Summary: This Hotel was way more than expected I give it a 10 Star. The Staff were very friendly go out of their way to assist, the rooms were excellent clean comfortable and provided all amenities including coffee, refrigerator and Microwave.  Pool and Jacuzzi were excellent providing a heated pool was a bonus. This will be the only place I stay when I travel to Anaheim and I will highly recommend to All. Thank you for making my stay so comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review regarding your stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We appreciate you staying with us and will pass your comments on to our staff.

Summary: The place was beautiful, nice area, clean rooms, the pool and Jacuzzi was a real pleasure! Very relaxing. Took my mother for Mothers Day and she was so relaxed that she fell asleep with no problem. The beds were so comfy!  We are definitely coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. What a wonderful Mother's Day gift. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: The staff at this hotel goes out of their way to provide guests with everything they need.
Summary: The room is always immaculate; the staff is the BEST feature; the employees seem to stay long term which tells you something about the management. Great place to stay with very reasonable rates. I would recommend this to anyone traveling in this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriot Cypress. We are very proud of our staff. They enjoy working here and most have been her for a very long time. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: I loved my stay at the Courtyard Marriott in Cypress the check in was fast n easy. The rooms were clean and affordable The pool was warm and jacuzzi was amazing.I recommend it to anyone that staff were helpful. I felt very comfortable staying there I will do it again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: I booked a room through Booking.com. Big mistake. Not only did the hotel not get the reservation, but I was charged two extra times for the same night by Booking.com for the room.  Sara at Courtyard was very pleasant in dealing with our situation when we first arrived. She apologized for the mix-up, got us a room and even gave us free breakfast. Later I contacted the hotel after seeing three charges for our stay. I emailed Alicia, the manager, and she tried to figure out what happened. I called back a few weeks later and she was able to track down how the overcharge occurred and credited my account. Alicia was very quick to respond to all my inquiries. Every staff member made us feel like they cared about our experience at their hotel.  Beautiful, welcoming place. Breakfast was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review in TripAdvisor regarding your stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. Alicia is our Front Office Manager and she trains her staff to take care of our travelers in the same manner. We are fortunate to have her and we hope to see you again.

Summary: The room was ready early due to their check-in mobile app.  It was a clean, comfortable room with a sofa and huge window.  The fitness center was clean and equipment always available.    The staff at the front desk and Bistro were great.  They were very friendly and hospitable. Being without a vehicle, the hotel's shuttle service was handy.    Great place to stay!  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you  for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress and taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. We are always thrilled to hear these great comments and especially how you were treated by our staff. Your comments will be passed on to the team and we hope to see you again.

Summary: The staff was very pleasant, very helpful and everything about the hotel made us comfortable and relaxed. This is my 2nd. time this year at this particular hotel.I love the way the staff converse with you and also how friendly they are. I officiate basketball in the Anaheim/LA area and I am able to use my Marriott VIP Athletic Card for a good rate. Most of all is the comfort and niceness of the rooms. I plan on returning a few more times this Summer. I really liked my stay at this hotel.!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We appreciate all of your great comments and they will be passed on to our staff. It is good to see you making use of your well deserved Marriott VIP Athletic Card. See you again this summer!

Summary: Room was very clean and ready upon arrival. Extra pillows and AC was on and dialed in.  Perks - decent breakfast offerings, bar, lunch and dinner too. Though not actual room service they offered to bring my order up due to conference call. Also... No charge for parking. Looking for Disneyland area hotel? Drive 8-10 minutes more and save money.  No cons here.  5 out of 5
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We are very proud of our hotel and it is always a pleasure to hear the results from our guests. We make sure we have everything needed for the traveler, whether it is business or pleasure. We hope you are able to come back and visit us soon.

Summary: I stayed here during a business trip.  The staff were all very helpful and the shuttle service provided was very useful.  The free breakfast, which you ordered off the menu, was excellent and a nice change from the usual buffets.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress!!

Summary: This hotel gets a five star rating because everything was perfect. The staff was extremely friendly. We arrived to the hotel around 12 midnight. We were greeted by helpful staff and were checked in very quickly. She was very aware of how tired we were after our flight and helped us in a timely manner. The beds were very comfortable. Best of all they had top of the line shampoo and conditioner, Paul Mitchell :)   I would book here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress and writing about your experience with us in detail. Your comments will be passed on to our staff and we hope you are able to come back and visit us again soon.

Summary: We spent two nights just recently.  I booked well in advance so thankfully got a bit of a break on pricing, as it seems you cannot get a decent room under $180 US anymore in the LA area.  And considering exchange for us, that is 30% more in our currency, so well over $200 a night for what they consider an 'economy' or efficiency type hotel.  Kind of high for a place to lay your head at night, IMO.  And everywhere in LA seems to charge extra for parking, and some for internet as well.  I chose this location as well for the free internet and free parking, as they offer it if not directly downtown.  On the map, the area looked ok and fairly industrial, and not too run down,  what I did not know is there is a hospital nearby so some siren activity.  The A/C is really loud, but its
Manager Response: Thank you  for your useful comments. We appreciate your time spent on letting us know how your visit was. We did complete our room renovation just one and a half years ago. We will follow up on your comments to help us be even better.

Summary: Stayed here for a quick trip to Disneyland.  Check in was fast and friendly.  Room was spacious, clean and nicely decorated.  Hotel is in a nice and easily accessible area.  There is an onsite restaurant to buy food and coffee from.  There is also a lot of places to eat around the hotel.  It was only about 15 minutes to Disneyland.  Check out was fast and friendly.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review in regards to your stay here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We appreciate your great comments and hope to see you back here soon.

Summary: After a long and particularly brutal day of travel, I was received by a front desk attendant named Itaila, who was gracious, calm, and as accommodating as anyone could have asked for. I highly appreciated this and it is making my stay completely worthwhile. I believe it's true that the first impression can make or break an experience, I give her a lot of credit for handling the front desk with professionalism and poise. If anyone in management is listening, you have a real gem with this employee. If she isn't in management yet, she should be.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to recognize one of our stars, Italia. Your message will definitely be passed along to her Supervisor and Management Team. We hope to see you again at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress.

Summary Heading: Hungry, but out of time? Jackie to the rescue!
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by the excellent service I received When I came to the Courtyard for traffic school. My original class had been cancelled, but I only found out after I had arrived that the class had been moved to a different location. I ended up having to wait to eat breakfast 2 hours later during our first 15 minute break. However, by the time I ordered my food in front lobby, I had to return to class. At this point, I was really hungry, so when Jackie offered to bring my food to me, I was thrilled & relieved I wouldn't have to wait 2 more hours to eat. I didn't even know the room number/ name I was in, but Jackie went out of her way to find out the room I was in and bring my food to me. Jackie definitely made my day. Awesome service :)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your time at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. Jackie has been with us since we opened our Bistro. I will make sure she reads your comments and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Awesome hotel for a long weekend
Summary: Spent a long early February weekend at the hotel for my son's basketball camp. The hotel was clean, centrally located to freeways and quiet. Starbucks is available 24x7, see the front desk if you need help. We will definitely be back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review,  we appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts and looking forward to having you here for your next stay.

Summary: First night was a great expreience. Front desk gave us choices as to place us in a room close to the elevator. My wife is pregnant so that was a plus. When we got to our room it was clean and to my standards. It has to be one of the best hotels I have been to. Everytime we walked out we were greeted by front desk employees. The drive from the hotel to Disneyland was quick and easy. Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and writing your comments in regards to your stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. It is always great to hear about our staff and how friendly and helpful they are to our guests. We hope to see you again.

Summary: This is our first stay at this hotel. My family and I were very impressed. We arrived close To midnight from a long drive with a grumpy toddler. We were checked in very quick, by the time I had my baby out of her car seat my husband was unloading with the room key In hand. The staff was very welcoming (I wish I got the GSRs name at checkin) she greeted my 1 year old, which made her smile  and a bit less grumpy. Our room was comfy and very clean, my kids didn't want to leave the room. Best part was no key issues and the wifi worked perfectly, I've stayed at many hotels and seem to always have a problem with both. It was a quick drive to Disneyland. We will be back for sure!!!  Thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. I will pass your comments on to our staff and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Nice, clean hotel with all the amenities you need.  Marriotts rarely disappoint.  Plenty of restaurants nearby.  Mitsubishi America headquarters right across the street.  They have a nicely appointed in house gym & pool.  Friendly staff that makes you feel at home.
Manager Response: We are always pleased to receive great reviews from our Mitsubishi travelers. Thank you for taking the time and hope to see you again here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress.

Summary: I love this location since it is an easy drive to Disneyland on surface streets avoiding the freeway. The coast/beach is also less than 30 mins away. This is the 3rd year we have stayed here while visiting Disneyland w/ the fam. This time we brought the mother-in-law so we got a 2nd room that was just across the hall. The staff is very welcoming and accommodating whether it was the front desk staff or the bistro staff. The maid service was exceptional and made my 4-year-old's day as they made her personal sofa bed every night including arranging her stuffed animals and blankets just the way she liked it. Thanks for the nice stay. Hope you will have us again! (BTW the "Do Not Disturb" door hangers are smaller than I have ever seen and fall off any time one opens or closes the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review in regards to your stay here at the Courtyard Cypress. We are one of the best kept secrets to an easier way to enjoy Disneyland. We are only seven miles away and just straight down Katella. No traffic to deal with. How wonderful to have your Mother-in Law with you  to enjoy her grandchildren. As far as the Do Not Disturb signs on the door- I will look into them and see if something can be done. Hope to see you again next year!! We appreciate the fact that you  have stayed with us for three years in a row!!

Summary: This hotel was clean, comfortable, and offered more than expected. The location was terrific for both visiting family and seeing Los Angeles and the beaches. We had an unexpected interruption in our trip from Montana to Mexico and ended up in LA for a few days. The staff were fantastic and we thoroughly enjoyed our reasonably priced stay in a great place!!! We would stay there again in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review in regards to your stay at the Courtyard Cypress. We are very proud of our staff and definitely agree that we are the perfect location. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed here while attending training nearby. I was welcomed and able to secure my room before heading out to training site. Provided transportation to and from training facility. Internet, microwave, fridge and comfortable bed made the room a home away from home.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor about your stay at the Courtyard Cypress. It's great to see that our guests are comfortable with our hotel.

Summary: The service from the front desk is amazing over here, Nicole and Sara are without a doubt the best front desk personnel I have come across. Every month they remember me by name, go out of the way to make my stay more enjoyable. Even when busy they remembered to get my toothbrush promptly delivered to my room! As a Marriott Rewards Member I feel valued with the overall services of these two young ladies.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to recognize two of our great employees here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We value our guests and it is always good to hear that they are being well taken care of. I will be passing this on to them and thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Nicole at the front desk went out of her way to help us transfer our reservation from a sister property so we could stay in our team hotel during a youth soccer trip. She was highly professional and helpful. The property is convenient for families and business travelers alike. We'll definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments in regards to our Front Desk Supervisor Nicole. We understand how important it is to keep a team together, especially in youth sports.  I will pass this on to Nicole and her Management team. We hope to see you again soon at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress.

Summary: Great stay.  The rate I paid was significantly cheaper than the government rate and it included breakfast.  Both Sarah and Italia at the front desk were great to talk to and helpful.  When I woke up at a bright and early eastern-time zone hour (before Starbucks was open), Italia made a great quad shot espresso to kick start my morning.      The fitness room was bright and clean, with typical free weights and cardio equipment.  A big plus was the number of channels offered while working out.  It seemed there were more on the cardio equipment than in the bedrooms.       I would stay at this location for either business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Thank you for commenting on your stay here at th the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We appreciate your business and always great to hear how our property works so well with our travelers needs. We hope to see you again soon and safe travels.

Summary: This review is to commend Crystal for her excellent customer service.  Even though I had already checked in, I quickly realized I probably should have gotten a room with a kitchen during my extended stay to accommodate my food needs. They didn't have any kitchen suites at that property, but Crystal very graciously and easily said that she would arrange for my current reservation to be cancelled, so that I could go to another Marriott property nearby that did.    There were a few phone calls and details, but Crystal was very patient and accommodating.  Also, the woman on the phone in Central Reservations was very helpful and easy-going about it all, even though it required transferring my e-certificate and points.  Thank you to both of you!!  It meant the world to me to have a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and letting us know how Crystal took great care of you. We apologize that we were not the right fit for you. We do have microwaves and refrigerators in all of our rooms but not always condusive for the traveler looking for a full kitchen Your comments will be passed along to our staff.

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights.  The bistro staff especially Silvia is very polite and helpful.  Even if you bring food in from out of the hotel they will provide utensils and plates.  They have an ample menu for breakfast which is delicious and their tapas are tasty as well. The hotel is within walking distance of several restaurants.  Fitness room is larger than most with 6 machines and free weights and star trac weight machine.  Coin laundry on site.  Rooms are spacious, closet is free standing and a little small.  Get a room with a thermostat, not all of them have them.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. Sylvia has been with us for over 16 years and we are very proud of her. I will pass your comments on to our staff and hope to see you again here soon. Happy New Year!!!

Summary: I travel for business and pleasure and I am in several hotels each month, I truly enjoyed my stay at this hotel.  Staff was excellent and the service was great.  Rooms being clean and modern were are plus.  Its centrally located to several freeways so getting around Orange County was a breeze.  I will definitely stay here the next time my travels bring me back to Cypress.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review in regards to your stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. Your message will be passed on to our staff and we hope to see you here again soon.

Summary: I recently stayed there for business.  Everything was wrong with this hotel.  I had requested the top floor but they couldn't honor my request.  The room was booked about 3 weeks in advance.   The front desk clerk, Felix, was incompetent and rude.  A coworker of mine checked in with him just prior to me.  I noticed that he got a complimentary bottle of water.  When he checked me in he did not offer me one.  When my coworker pointed out to him that I too was entitled to one, he grudgingly retrieved one from the back.  He did not offer an apology or anything.  When I got it I noticed that it even had my name on it.  The next night I found my key cards to not work.  That required a trip from my room to the front desk.  Although I was greeted by a different front desk clerk I was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and we apologize for the issues you encountered. We will discuss this with Felix. Because these reviews are anonymous we are unable to check which room you were in and why your key may not have worked. We appreciate your business and hope you come back and give us another chance.

Summary Heading: Late check in for a one night stay...slept like a baby
Summary: Very soft bed, very clean and very quiet. They have a 24hour convenience "nook" next to the check in where you can pick up juice, beer, water, snacks, prepared salad, etc.  The staff was very nice and checking out was a breeze.  Perfect place to sleep or make home base during a short visit
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your comments on our Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We hope to see you here again and have a Happy New Year!

Summary Heading: Other brands are going to eat this place for lunch...literally
Summary: Looks nice, friendly staff, clean rooms, etc. So why, in an industry trending towards more free food, does this place excel at no free food? Not even free coffee! Really. I wont be back. And this is not a convenient location to grab a quick bite next door. So, you either pay exorbitantly for your yogurt or you starve. I'm very worried about what's going to happen to SPG given the Marriott Rewards standard is so far below. The wifi also didn't work properly and kept reconnecting. The only reason I stayed here, my first Marriott stay this year, was bc United offered the free Gold status. I decided several years ago that other loyalty programs were eating the Marriott lunch and abandoned trying to keep an elite status. But I figured the free gold status was an opportunity to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your kind words about our staff and property. The Marriott has many different brands offering different complimentary meals. The Courtyards have found the Bistro serving Breakfast and Dinner a huge success but we understand it is not what everyone is looking for. The Residence Inn, Springhill Suites, Town Place and Fairfield Inn's all offer breakfast included in the rate. We apologize for the problem you encountered with your wifi and it has been reported. We appreciate you staying with us and sorry we have lost you as a valued customer.

Summary: We have family in the area and come up here often. This hotel is our go to, because of a few things. Location is great for us, price is right. Kids and I feel safe and secure. The food downstairs fits our needs. I like the place and our room is always very clean.  We will return again and again, because it's nice to know that we'll always have a positive experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review in regards to your stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. It sounds as though we are truly a home away from home for your family. We appreciate your business and hope to see you all again soon. Safe Travels!

Summary: Everyone was very kind and helpful and made my business trip great. Sarah, Nam, Crystal, Nicole, Mary, and Sylvia. Made my stay great will definitely come back to this hotel if I am in the area again.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review about our Courtyard by Marriott Cypress and recognizing our great staff! We are passing this message on to them and hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Perfect location for our High School Reunion- weekend event
Summary: Friday evening we held a Welcome Reception in the lounge area. This was an area that held booths, table & chairs  tall bar stools around a bar plus many lounge chairs and couches.  With around 55 attending no matter where you were sitting you could watch those coming and going.   Saturday was our main event. This establishment understood what we wanted &  how we wanted things to appear. From the time everyone started arriving (4:30pm) the staff handled everything with ease.  The banquet was decorated beautifully. I loved the Royal Blue Sashes over the back of the chairs.  Room looked Awesome for 130 guests. In the 55 years that I have been a Reunion Organizer this place was the best. Did I mention the delicious food? Never before were there any compliments on your food. Prepared
