Manager Response: We were so lucky to be able to be part of Jordan High School's Class Reunion. We enjoyed watching youn enjoy your well planned weekend. What a great committee- Thank you for your great comments!! Hope to see you back next year.

Summary Heading: 5 out of 5 overall but still room for improvement
Summary: Taking everything into account this was a great hotel. We used points, so nothing we can say on price, however, staying here with the family for a trip to Disney I have to rate it 5 out of 5.  Location is perfect. We valet parked our car and didn't need to get it back until checkout. Literally a 5 minute walk to Disney.  The room was excellent also. 2 double beds plus bunk beds which the kids loved. Spacious bathroom also with separate shower and bath which was nice.  Only thing I would say which let this place down was the restaurant and bar. It was more of a self service type deal with no real bar - just a central island where you could help yourself to drinks . There were some items you could order - like breakfast sandwiches but these weren't great. Having said that, there
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a great review and glad you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: For some reason I had great memories of this hotel from a year ago, but I must have had it mixed up with another hotel. The location on Katella is very convenient to lots of Orange County locations (between Long Beach and Anaheim), near the MUST stop Katella Deli, and convenient to a Costco. But the hotel itself left a lot to be desired. The room had nonexistent temperture control; the room was set at 68 when I arrived, yet the room temp was 76 (and both stayed that way the whole weekend - not one degree of temperature lowering), The room furnishings were very dated -- looked like a cheap 70s disco, with a couch that felt like the springs were sticking out. Staff was very slow to answer the phone, no matter what time I called the front desk. I'd recommend a different propoerty -
Manager Response: Thank you Bryan G for your comments and I am sorry we did not meet your expectations.  We do pride ourselves on providing a great stay for everyone and we will share your comments with our team.  It really is a great location and we do thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Location is pretty close to Disney Resort, with plenty of restaurants and shops a few miles away. The lobby area was always cleaned and very well maintained even when it was busy. Rooms, service and landscaping were all very good. The plus here though is that at the time of check in they offered us a free food voucher for the on site hot grille/cafe per every stay. I'm not big on complimentary breakfast so the fact that they didn't offer one wasn't a problem for me. They do have a breakfast buffet for a surcharge. The main lobby seemed trendy and always has something going on, but never overwhelming. Bed and pillows were so comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to respond to this survey. We appreciate your comments and your business. I am thinking maybe you were here while a special Breakfast Buffet was going on for teams and you were offered a special rate to partake. We do have our Bistro open for Breakfast and Dinner- Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: hotel was nice. rooms and grounds taken good care of.problem we had was no complimentary breakfast?first courtyard we've been to that didn't have this.if you wanted you had to pay for and was costly.roughly $12 to $15 dollars each with beverage! happy hour cocktails also pricey. wouldn't stay here again cause of.in our room no information of amenities and what was around.complained to front desk and had to ask her about breakfast,cocktails,restaurants in area?
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. We do get a lot of compliments on our property inside and outside.  Generally the Courtyard Brand of Marriott does not include breakfast and I apologize if you were expecting it. We do have the Courtyard Bistro which is extremely popular with our guests. Our front desk staff is very good about explaining what we have to offer as well as pointing out the use of our Lobby GoBoard listeing all of our amenities as well as surrounding restaurants etc.  Again, please accept our apologies for any misunderstanding.

Summary: Great stay and great staff, this Marriott met our expectations!!  Very clean from the lobby to the rooms!  Also looks like recently renovated.  The area also is in a great location and we felt very safe the whole time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I will pass your comments on to our staff. I am glad to hear your family enjoyed their stay, we take great pride in our cleanliness

Summary Heading: deserves to be on Hotel Hell
Summary: I would never come back here again and wish I could get a refund or give in no stars at all.There were many problems in my 2 day, 1 night stay so I am just going to start from the beginning. I checked in late Friday night and there was nobody at he front desk and a 1960s high school reunion going on. The reunion didn't bother me but it took a while to get someone to check us in. Finally someone in jeans and a sweatshirt showed up - didn't look an employee at all - and checked us in. Midway through the process they stuck on their trainee badge. There was no one watching the trainee? Got up to our room and the decor was tacky and had an elderly stench. The beds were uncomfortable and the TV placement was bad. Also, there was no channel guide so you just had to flip through
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay and we are very sorry that we did not meet your expectations.  We have shared your comments with our team here for we are always looking for ways to improve ourselves. Just on a side note, the Courtyard by Marriott brand is an official sponsor with the NFL, and on NFL game days our hotel, like many Courtyards, celebrate by wearing our favorite team jerseys.

Summary Heading: Better than average Courtyard, Stay towards the top on the pool side for free fireworks every night.
Summary: This is a better than average Courtyard. Mini-fridge, microwave, elongated toilet, quieter than average air conditioning, water saving faucet, etc. The carpet was cleaner than expected, I walked around in my white socks and they showed no signs of dirt from the carpet. Bed, pillows, and sheets were nice. Shower was good.  Ninja Note: Stay on the top floors on the back of the building to watch Disney Lands fireworks every night.  I would stay here again. My only beef with them was when I stay, I don't want room service at all. They insisted on printing out a dated letter saying sorry we couldn't clean your room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We found by adding the mini refrigerators and microwaves to all of our sleeping rooms during our recent renovation, we have created a great convenience for our guests. I will pass your comments onto our staff and thank you for staying with us.

Summary: I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone. Centralized location and a great value for the money. The building, staff and appearance were outstanding. I never am disappointed in a Marriott Hotel. Easy access too. I know that we will definitl;y be coming back here. Plus...the beds were extremely comfortable. It has been a long time since I have slept so well. . Great for families and solos and couples. I cannot say enouggh about the STAFF.
Manager Response: We are fortunate to be located in such a centralized area. Very convenient and freeway close from several main highways. Thank you for your comments.

Summary Heading: Great location to many California destinations
Summary: Always clean and professional. Great location if you are visiting for business or vacation. Easy access to both Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm without all the traffic and crowds. You can see Disney fireworks from the east rooms. Starbucks served in the lobby is nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. You are right, we are the perfect location for visiting Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm. I will pass your great comments on to our staff.

Summary: great hotel, quiet and clean.Reasonably priced. I stayed there for 6 nights. and will always stay there when I visit the area. Easy access to  Disney land, Huntington beach and long beach. parking was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate being your home away from home for six nights. Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel in Cypress Anaheim/Orange County
Summary: This hotel is a great value for the money in Orange County. This hotel is close to major freeways, shopping, and restaurants. The rooms, lobby, restaurant/bar area are all modern and up to current Courtyard standards and styles. The lobby/lounge/bar area is huge at this hotel location so you can socialize with many people all at once.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are in a great location for business and leisure. Our rooms are completely renovated and we are very proud of our staff. Thank you

Summary: Bent over backwards repeatedly because of small challenges or items THEY felt out of place. Clean room, attentive staff and personnel, and free parking. If you are going to Disneyland and have your own car, this is close enough and comfortable as well!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Our view of the fireworks from Disneyland is an added plus here if you ask for your room facing east. I will pass your comments on to our staff. They do a great job.

Summary: The rooms themselves are nice, though a bit small. Beds were comfortable though. It claims to be near Disneyland and technically its true but quite a hike. The nearest shuttle stop isn't that close either. The staff was nice, the hotel itself was clean and quiet so no complaints there. Just wish it was a tad more accessible to the theme park
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It seems as though you were pleased with the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress however, you stated we were not accesible to Disneyland. Unfotunately, you were not aware of the city bus that runs every 25 minutes just across the street from the hotel up until midnight. Maybe you did not want public transportation. Please come back and try us again and you will see we are conveniently located to the theme parks but out of the way of the crowded Anaheim area with higher rates, taxes, parking etc! We do appreciate your business.

Summary Heading: Don't overlook because it's in Cypress ...
Summary: By far 1 of the nicest Marriott Courtyards anywhere.  Very large and spacious lobby and lounge area for hanging out.  Super attentive and accommodating staff.  Even though it is in Cypress (as opposed to better known neighbors as Anaheim, etc, it is still very conveniently located to all of north OC's attractions.  This place is a GEM ...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your comments here in TripAdvisor. We are always happy to hear that our guests are pleased with our hotel and notice our newly renovated rooms. We are very proud of the service our guests receive. We hope you travel our way again soon

Summary: Excellent service across the board.   Had some special requests and maintenance issues but all were accommodated quickly and cheerfully.   Great Service!   Received very personal service from Front Desk, Caf√©, Maintenance, Housekeeping.  I travel a lot and stay in Marriott hotels a lot and this hotel was much better than average.   What made the difference was the attitude of the staff.   It was more than just a job to them.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment on our great staff. It is always good to hear that our guests are being treated well.  They do go through extensive, ongoing training and it obviously shows here at the bCourtyuard by Marriott Cypress.

Summary: My bestie and I decided to spend a weekend relaxing by a pool and chose this hotel for the price and the convenience of it being close. We also thought that it might not be too busy that far from Knott‚Äôs and Disneyland, however the hotel was booked for the weekend. Luckily we made reservations the week before. Anyway, we arrived early, (before 11:00) and were pleased to know that one of the rooms was available. They stated that they would have the room next door cleaned and would be ready after 3:00‚Ä¶.very accommodating. We left our bags in one room and went down to the pool to enjoy. We were pleasantly surprised to find just a few very well behaved children playing in the pool. Since we brought pool rafts with us, we were not sure if there would be room for everyone, but the
Manager Response: Thank you staying with us at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress.  It sounds as though you made the most of your stay. The early checkin- utilizing the pool and our nearby restaurants within walking distance in addition to the cleanliness of your room had to have it made it a great "Staycation"  Thank you for your review.

Summary: After staying there with me and my girlfriend so very nice hotel I live in Cyprus I work in Buena Park I'm around the area they have good holiday events there and for Thanksgiving have a very good buffet that's all day where's the money and to take your family it's kind of spendy 70 dollars a plate but you can eat as many as you want the staff is always friendly and caters well to elderly people soothing music nice staff the parking lot could use a little more security but for the most part it's worth the money thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business. I am thinking you may have attended a private gathering  where the organizer charged $70.00 to cover expenses like decorations, printing etc. We are very reasonably priced for our special events but have no control on any additional charges that may occur outside our pricing structure. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: I was surprised at how quiet it was with how full the parking lot was. The room was on the top floor and was clean and comfortable. We used this as a central point to go to Universal Hollywood as well as to an Angels game and Downtown Disney.  Convenient to all.   The restaurant provided huge breakfast portions.  We would have shared had we known.   The staff was helpful in making recommendations.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress. It looks as though you had a busy agenda and hopefully our quiet hotel made it easy for you to get a good night sleep and feel energized!

Summary: We needed to be in the Cypress area for a family event and had no idea where to stay.  We took a chance on the Courtyard and we were very happy with what we found.  The rooms were very clean and well decorated.  The lobby was open with several areas to relax and have a Starbucks coffee.  The personnel at the front desk were nice and quick to help us with any requests.  In particular - Crystal stood out as our favorite at the desk.  Always happy and smiling and willing to go the extra mile to make our stay fantastic!!! We will be returning here!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I will pass your comments on to Crystal. She is definitely one of our STARS!!  We hope you return soon.

Summary: I was rather surprised at some of the low reviews. My family stayed here for 5 days from June 28th thru July 3rd for my daughter's 8th birthday bash of Disneyland the Aquarium of the Pacific and Huntington beach. It is super close to everything, it is in a nice area, fanatically clean, the staff is wonderful, Crystal helped me at the front desk and she was kind and friendly. The rooms were spacious and impeccably clean. I know the sheets and towels were properly cleaned beacause I could smell the bleach every time we used them. If I needed anything from guest services which we did, they were there within 3 minutes of calling. My favorite thing about this hotel is you have to use your room key to get into any outside doors after 10pm, unless you walk through the front doors. This
Manager Response: Thank you for submitting your review. It sounds as though you planned a perfect Birthday Celebration for your daughter. We take great pride in being the #1 hotel out of the eight in our area on TripAdvisor! I will pass your message on to our staff and especially to Crystal.

Summary: I stay at Courtyard's quite a bit this one is as good as you will find anywhere.  The check in and out process is seamless.  The staff is courteous and professional.  The rooms are very nice and quiet.  This was also very close to the business I was visiting.  You will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your great comments. I will pass this on to our staff and hope you will be visiting again soon.

Summary: We needed to stay near my brother's for one night, and he recommend this Marriott. Great choice!  After a cancelled flight and very long day, the staff was welcoming and friendly and super efficient.  The room was quiet, spacious, very comfortable and gave us a great night's sleep. My only two eco-friendly suggestions for the Courtyard are to start using bulk shampoo and soap dispensers and convert their shower fixtures to low-flow operable ones.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and writing a great review. We always appreciate hearing about our staff and property and welcome feedback from our guests. We continue to move forward on becoming eco-friendly and will do all we can. Hope to see you again here at the Courtyard Cypress.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for business or pleasure
Summary: The Courtyard by Marriott hotels are my favorites! Every bit as nice as the larger Marriott hotels, but larger rooms, nicer staff and far more affordable. The Courtyard by Marriott Cypress/Anaheim/OC is just east of East Long Beach/Rossmoor area on Katella Blvd. Easy to get to, large enjoyable rooms and very nice lounge area. I have worked with Sally and Cherie in their sales department on several occasions and find them to be wonderful, friendly and extremely helpful. There is NOTHING about this hotel I would change!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a great review on the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. Our newly renovated rooms have definitely been a hit and our location is so convenient to the 405, 91, and 605 Freeways. We hope you are able to visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Hands Down our Favorite Hotel in the OC
Summary: Every time we come into town for a visit this is the place to stay. For only $10 more a night, it is worth it to book the executive suite. The room is spacious: living room with sofa bed, desk, TV, fridge/micro/wet bar and then a separate bedroom with comfy king bed and another TV. Bathroom typical with shower/tub combo. The room is clean and very fresh and modern. We had a small glitch of the a/c not cooling the room which they promptly and apologetically sent up maintenance who quickly rectified the problem also leaving an apology note and small goody bag of candy. The bistro food is fresh tasty and reasonably priced; makes it so easy that we can just crash at the room and have food and not bothering going out, even though there are plenty of choices within a 1-2 mile radius.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. Our suites are very popular and we have 24 of them. Your comments will be passed onto our staff and looking forward to your return visit in September.

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights on a business trip.  Rooms were adequate but the big thing is that they were EXTRMELY clean...nothing grosses me out more than a bathroom that looks like a gas station men's room.  Not the case here.  Great service downstairs.  Breakfast is not the usual Home Town Buffet feeding frenzy......each order is individual off a menu.  Great service and great food.  Would definitely stay here again.  Good parking options also outside.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and mentioning how clean our hotel is. We take great pride in our staff's constant training to ensure the comfort of our guests are always taken care of.  The complimentary parking makes our hotel very attractive and affordable considering the high rates in Anaheim.

Summary: Overall great hotel.  Well located, very accommodating staff, particularly the morning breakfast folks.  Breakfast was reasonable in cost but many choices and good quality.  Our room was comfortable, spacious and modern.  All around good value.  Not sure how to describe this busy area but there are numerous dining options within a reasonable drive or close by.  We went to Walt's Wharf in Seal Beach perhaps 20 minutes away.   This hotel is an easy 20 minutes from Disneyland but without all the chaos.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It is always great to hear from our guests and learn what they see from their viewpoint. Our Bistro breakfast and dinner has been a great addition to the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. Even though there are many dining options surrounding us and certainly you found an alltime favorite in Walts Wharf Seal Beach, the Bistro is very convenient with a lot of choices. The drive to the beaches are very easy as well as Disneyland- which is just 7 miles down Katella. We hope you visit us again soon!!i

Summary: It was a real good experience staying @ Marriott. Spacious clean rooms and bathroom.  Service was very good. Very comfortable stay and front desk staff were very friendly. It was a memorable one. There is an Indian restaurant near by , Recreational park and great neighborhood. We got an upgrade to an executive suite for the same price of normal room. I am happy!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. We appreciate your kind comments and will pass it on to our staff. You had mentioned the Indian Restaurant nearby so please note if you return to the area and are not already aware, we are only a fifteen minute drive from Little India on Pioneer Blvd in Artesia. There are a number of restaurants and shops that you will enjoy. Again, thank you!

Summary: I could not be more pleased with my experience here! The friendly, helpful and professional staff made my stay enjoyable. The atmosphere and cleanliness of the hotel was comfortable and inviting. I travel often for work and must say the bed was one of the top on my list. A++++
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We take great pride in our customer service and the cleanliness of the hotel. Our ongoing Marriott Training is of great value and it obviously shows from reviews like this.

Summary: Great rooms.  Spacious, good bed, lots of pillows, large bathroom, great shower ( lots of water), easy climate control heating/cooling, coffee in room, excellent and courteous staff.  We stay there while we run our horses at Los Alamitos race track.  Shopping is close and great golf course nearby, Seal Beach Navy course.  Do not need to be in military to play.  Great restaurants close: Chilis, Olive garden, Fish Market among some.
Manager Response: Thank you for sending in your review of the Courtyard by Marriott Cypess. You have discovered the great Seal Beach Naval Golf Course open to the public only two miles away as well as our variety of surrounding restaurants. We hope to see you back here soon.

Summary Heading: Friendly And helpful staff! Especially Ian King!
Summary: I come here almost every month for business and every month it's a pleasant stay. The continental breakfast is top notch! Staff is very friendly and eager to help. Last weekend I was trying to check in early and Ian King at the front desk found a way to make it happen. He was very busy manning the front desk by himself, but he was extremely attentive and efficient. He even got me a complimentary coffee! I was able to get my work done thanks to him. That really made my day!
Manager Response: Ian, our Front Office Manager is defintely a favorite with our guests. He spends a lot of time with his staff to ensure our guests are well taken care of.  Thank you for letting us know about your great experience here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress.

Summary Heading: Exactly what I was looking for!
Summary: This is my first time staying here and I will definitely stay here again!  The hotel is updated from the bottom to the top.  The room I had was awesome with new everything including the carpet and couch.  The bed was very comfortable with soft linens.  The bathroom was also larger than I see in most other Courtyards with a large counter.  There is a fridge and a microwave which is a nice touch.  Btw, I had a standard room, not a suite.  I also used the gym a couple times and it is definitely one of the nicer gyms for a Courtyard.  All of the equipment looks new and it made my workouts nice!  I also ate at the restaurant which is your typical Bistro Courtyard food which I am fine with when I am traveling for work and just want something easy and convenient.   I come to Orange
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review of your stay with us here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We are extremely proud of our latest renovation and the guests are really enjoying the changes. We are glad you finally found us and hope to see you back here soon.

Summary Heading: Sad this was just a business trip!
Summary: Stayed here only one night but will stay here again. Chose this hotel due to its proximity to a meeting I had to go to. But with its location close to Disneyland, I will be sure to come back with the family. This hotel is great as it is close enough to the park but far enough that you don't get the craziness that come with a lot of tourists. Rooms are large and clean. Staff very friendly. They serve breakfast and dinner in the bistro and offer room service during dinner. Starbucks also right there in the lobby. I couldn't have asked for more comfort, customer service and convenience. Looking forward to coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and what you have mentioned about not having the time to enjoy Disneyland while you were here is pretty common with our business travelers. You are right, here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress we are only seven miles straight down the road from Disneyland and we do see our guests return with their families to enjoy what the area has to offer without the hustle and bustle of the Disneyland hotels with the higher tax rate and parking fees. Hope to see you back here soon!!

Summary: The staff at this hotel go above and beyond. Greeting each guest with inviting smiles. I love the gift bags. It is such a nice touch. The room was perfect. The kings sized bed was comfortable and allowed for a good night sleep. The desk and work area is just the right size and height conducive to productivity if you have to work in the room. The restraint and bar staff were pleasant and knowledgable. I will definayely return the next time I am in need of lodging in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We appreciate your compliments in regards to our staff and property. We hope you are able to come back and visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Customer service was exceptional! Ian kinsley you the Real MVP!
Summary: After visiting a couple of different hotels, the customer service and the pricing was more than I had asked for! Ian kinsley, the front office manager, is a cool dude and provided warm and friendly service! Plus this place has its own Starbucks!!! Ian and the courtyard staff as a whole took care of us! I cannot wait to come and visit again!
Manager Response: Wow!!! Thank you so much for writing about Ian and his staff. We are very proud of them and enjoy the compliments. You are right- Ian is an MVP and is pretty popular around here. We are very fortunate to have him! Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Great staff! Hotel is clean and nice. I stay in this hotel regularly on business. It has been remodeled to a new look which we all have seen on TV while watching an NFL game. Great location as well as Disneyland is not that far away.
Manager Response: We appreciate your business and it is always great to know that you are being well taken care of. We are proud of our new look and being close enough to Disneyland without the high price for parking and taxes is a great plus for us only being 7 miles down Katella! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I stay at this hotel regularly on business-it is always clean, inviting and has a friendly staff. Hotel has the "new" Courtyard look. Rooms are clean, comfortable, and the beds are pretty comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We appreciate your business and great comments.

Summary: Superior customer service, so welcoming, staff well groomed and professional, clean room, super clean bathroom, comfortable bed, food at the Bistro was fantastic! I was on business and my stay was like having a vacation day! Will definitely return. From check-in to check-out I had a 5 star stay! Thank you to all staff at Courtyard Cypress Marriott in Anaheim you all rock!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for all of your wonderful comments and thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We hope to see you again soon and this will be shared with our staff. We appreciate your business!!

Summary: Quiet business park environment,  Off the freeways yet still close enough to major travel routes.  Nicely refurbished rooms and public areas.  Very comfortable beds.  Management provided a nice buffet breakfast to our group as part of the reasonable rate.  Just 10 min to Knotts and 15 min to Disneyland via surface streets makes this a great family base camp.  Desk personnel were very pleasant and helpful.  Several restaurant choices within 3 to 4 blocks.  Well run hotel and a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our newly renovated property. It seems as though you were able to enjoy not only the hotel but the pleasant surroundings and all we have to offer. We hope you come back and stay with us at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress.

Summary: Stayed here on business for 5 days. Good room service and great views from my room on the 5th floor. Breakfast bar was a tad expensive. I had an emergency meeting on one of the days and needed room service for breakfast - it was delivered in under 5 minutes!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review about your stay here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We hope to have you back here for another business.

Summary Heading: Enjoyable and fun working travel time
Summary: My recent stay at  Courtyard Marriott Cypress was a very nice experience, enjoying the nice atmosphere of all the areas inside, permitted me to have a relaxing time for my business travel to the Cypress area, there are many excellent restaurants around with variety in food, doing my fitness every day in the well equipped gym, and some other entertainment places made my time excellent. .... And sure next time I will be back..
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and so glad you were able to enjoy the hotel mixing business with pleasure. We are looking forward to your return- Safe travels and thank you for staying with us at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress.

Summary: Many thanks to Ian and the staff for making my stay far better than previous times. The hotel is conveniently located to businesses in the area.  Although I always have stayed only one night, it seems like a good choose for longer stays.  The room was clean and spacious.  The staff was friendly when I checked in.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments in reference to our Front Office Manager, Ian Kinsley and Staff. Your message will be passed on to them. We appreciate your business and hope you return soon.

Summary: Spent one night only while in town for a family emergency.  Room was very clean and quiet.  Living area when you walk in and sleeping area in the back.  Flat screen TV's in both rooms.  Refrigerator and microwave.  Set up like a business hotel.  The bed was very comfortable with a lot of nice pillows.  Would stay again. Nice bar/Starbucks in the main lobby.  Lobby was busy with kids that appeared to be from some sort of sports team but never heard any noise once I got to the room.
Manager Response: Thank you Michael for your great review. Sorry you were here for an emergency and hope all went well.   We do have teams in here periodically, mainly on a weekend but we do manage to keep them under control as you witnessed, with letters to the parents and coaches outlining our expectations and consequences if ther eseems to be a lack of supervision and it does seem to work well for all guests. Our teams do tend to be well-behaved.  Hope to see you return on an non-emergency situation.

Summary: I love staying here!!! The staff is extremely helpful, very friendly and professional. The area is in a quite business street in a perfect location. The beds and pillows are heaven on earth!!! Lol. I love crashing out there cuz of the comfort and peace and quite. I am definitely staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a great review on your time spent here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress.  Your comments are greatly appreciated and I will share them with the staff.

Summary: Stayed here for 7 nights on family Disneyland/beach vacation. Love the traffic-free & freeway-free 15 min drive to Disneyland no matter what time of day. The staff was super nice and the property was clean. Plenty of restaurant options & grocery stores close by. 2nd year in a row staying in this hotel and it's already part of our 2016 trip plans.
Manager Response: Thank you for you review, your comments about our employees will be passed onto them. We take great pride in our staff and enjoy hearing the ongoing compliments not only here in TripAdvisor but on the property level as guests comment to our management team. You definitely have found one of our best kept secrest! Disneyland only seven miles away and straight down Katella. Our guest enjoy being away from the hustle and bustle of all the traffic etc . Thank you for staying with us two years now and we will enjoy seeing you again!

Summary: We arrived very early in the morning (or late night depending on how you look at it).  We were greeted immediately in a cheerful manner; despite being 2:00 AM.  She checked us in easy, arrange for a late check out and mentioned the breakfast hours and the 24 hour mini store they had.  Parking was easy and she told us the best place to park to access our room.  We immediately noticed the gym which was well equipped yet we didn't have time to use it.  The room was huge and clean.  The bed was very large and super comfy.  The room had a great layout and the coffee pot, microwave and fridge were a plus if we needed them.  We were only there a few hours however we will be returning.  It was close to a breakfast spot we found which we too fell in love with.  This hotel isn't
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We have recently completed the renovation of all of our sleeping rooms completing the renovationschedule of our entire hotel. The addition of the microwaves and refrigerators have been a great addition to these rooms. Thank you for staying with us and hope you make it back soon!

Summary Heading: Clean and reasonable value but nothing special
Summary: This hotel has good parking, free WiFi that works, and a small pool. Food choices are limited, but ok if you want a quick meal and are happy with burger or pizza. No real atmosphere in the limited bar.  Room was comfortable and clean, basic selection of amenities, Pool is functional but not very attractive, small pool surrounded by concrete wall, Ok for a cooling dip but not very attractive surround. Check in was friendly and efficient. Plenty of places to eat 5 minutes drive away but not much a short walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, it is greatly appreciated as our guests comments of our hotel is very important to us. We have a vast array of items on our Bistro Breakfast and Dinner menu with fresh and healthy choices but we do understand completely that it might not be for everybody. We do have an El Torito, Chilis, Thai Restaurant, Japanese and Fresh Fish Grille within walking distance. All less that 1/4 mile.   The good news is the building next door to us is about to be a food court with several other choices for our guests.  We hope you travel back and see the changes and thank you for the business.

Summary: This hotel is very reasonable, especially for the area where it is located.  The staff has been very helpful with finding places to eat and visit after our sessions.  They include a cooked breakfast from their cafe with a government employee ID.  The little cafe and bar have more than the typical hotel of this size.  The lounge and rooms have been updated and are very quiet and comfortable.  A heated pool is a nice touch as well.  Close to interstates, Disney, and beaches too.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review of the  Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. I will pass your kind comments onto our staff. Our Bistro is a very popular addition to our hotel with many choices for both breakfast and dinner.  Thank you for staying with us and hope you travel back this way again soon.

Summary: This hotel was a good place to stay.  The room was spacious and the bed comfortable.  All the staff were pleasant. It was close to major highways and several restaurants within a few minutes of driving.  The refrigerator didn't work but it was quickly replaced after reporting it.  We didn't eat at the lounge but the menu looked good.  They did have Starbucks available so we were satisfied.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to send in a review on the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. It is obvious from your remarks that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms.    Our Bistro is very popular with not only our guests bur our locals in the area with a nice relaxing atmosphere serving great food.  I will pass your comments onto the staff. Hope you are coming back to visit us soon and thank you for staying with us!

Summary: Family trip from LA to Anaheim and end trip in San Diego. This hotel is only 13 minutes drive to Disneyland.  -Very clean room and good breakfast.  -Quiet -Convenient free parking right by the front lobby.   This place beats the LAX Marriott on Century Blvd. by far regarding cleanliness and service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review here in TripAdvisor to make other potential travelers to the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress aware and comfortable in making reservations to stay with us. We are only seven miles from Disneyland and away from the hustle and bustle of downtown Anaheim with complimentary parking and a much lower occupancy tax. Our Bistro serving Breakfast, Dinner, Starbucks and Cocktails is very popular with our guests. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We found this hotel brand new and no odor of any kind when we stayed there. Very close to all the kids attractions in Anaheim and the Huntington beach. Lighting in this room was unique with ample bright white lights instead of the dim lights you see in other hotels. Overall we had a pleasant experience in this hotel. There is no free breakfast but they do have free internet.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a great review on the cleanliness of our hotel.  We realize how important it is to our guests to know that the hotel they are staying in is clean and fresh. Our housekeeping department is very aware of this and works very hard to make sure this happens!

Summary: What an incredible manager and staff at the Courtyard in Cypress! After a somewhat confusing experience trying to book a reservation online, I was unable to get the assistance I needed with 1-800-Marriott, but after hearing about my difficulty, Ian Kinsley, the Front Office Manager, sent me an  email first thing in the morning with the assurance that he'd handled all of my concerns before I was even able to speak with him. The front desk staff was equally attentive and kind when I had contacted them the day prior and I can only imagine that this team of Marriott folks has made the Cypress location a TOP NOTCH place to stay in the Southern California area.   I've stayed at dozens of hotels in the last year and I can say hands-down, that this was the BEST experience I've had with
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress and for your wonderful comments about Ian Kinsley, Front Office Manager and his team. We are very proud of our staff and the efforts they put forth to ensure our guests are well taken care of. We are looking forward to your next visit and feel free to contact Ian personally to make your next reservation 714 827-1010

Summary: I stayed here for 2 nights on a business trip.  The staff is friendly, the rooms are very clean, and they have wifi and plugs throughout the lobby.  I was impressed with the micro and mini frig, and the room was large and simple.  I have to agree with the reviewer who mentioned the weird angle of the TV, but, I didn't really want anyway.  The exercise room was good and they even had a shuttle that took us next door, in the rain.  I would return in a heartbeat; Great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: What a nice place to stay
Summary: Wonderful hotel with a Starbucks inside the hotel. Very clean and well kept hotel. If you work out they have a nice compliment of dumbells, treadmills, and ellipticals. It was also a nice treat to be able to use the outside pool and jacuzzi which was very clean and relaxing after a long day at work.  It has a nice trendy lounge area with nice places to eat and also visit with people. Great open business center too!
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review on your stay here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. It is always good to hear that our guests are enjoying what we have to offer. We hope to see you again and Happy Holidays!

Summary: This is my second stay this year.  The measure of the hotel is whether it continues to be good the second and third and fourth time you stay.  As with the last stay, the room was clean comfortable and well appointed.  The hotel Staff is friendly, even at 3:30 in the morning when I'm looking for a cup of coffee.  This is my go-to hotel in Cypress and will continue to be as long as the service remains good.  The one thing Marriott I could do, and many Marriotts do it, is to offer free coffee in the lobby like they used to. I realize this is a corporate decision designed to build revenue, however many of us don't particularly care for Starbucks or attempted Starbucks. We just want a cup of coffee.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us twice and we hope to see you even more. Your comments are greatly appreciated and will be passed on to our staff. We understand your concern on the coffee situation in the lobby. You are correct, this was a corporate decision. We will be more than happy to give you extra coffee for your room if requested and the Bistro personnel are in very early in the morning setting up and I am sure they will accomodate you. Again, thank you!

Summary: During a recent trip to Southern California, I had the opportunity to stay at the Courtyard Marriott in Cypress (between Anaheim and Long Beach). I chose this location because of it's close proximity to relatives. Upon arriving, the staff at the desk were friendly, professional and enthusiastic, although I arrived late in the evening. The room assigned to me was clean and by the looks, recently updated. However, when I proceeded to adjust the temperature in the room, I discovered that the ac/heating unit appeared to be the original equipment installed when the hotel first opened it's doors. The temperature control knob was worn and had to be carefully adjusted to achieve the desired result. In all fairness, I did not report this, but at the same time, felt that this should have
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your experience her at the Courtyard. We apologize for the Air Conditioning issue you experienced. The good news is we are replacing our air conditioners but is quite a process with 180 rooms but we have made great strides.  Again, thank you for your comments.

Summary: Quick Disney getaway from the SF/Bay Area...  I have a penchant for clean and comfortable living when away from home.   This hotel met my needs and I was totally pleased with my stay. Located in the middle of a business/office park, after hours the area is extremely quiet -a PLUS!   Cute bistro and bar (breakfast & dinner hours only) and the general 3-Star hotel amenities.  No continental breakfast, but the FREE parking and FREE internet is an acceptable exchange.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review and compliment us on a job well done here at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress. I have passed your comments on to our various departments and hope you will be back to visit us soon.

Summary: I'm not sure why, but there are a lot of companies located in this strange corridor near Cypress, Irvine, and Anaheim.  If you have to travel to one of those for work, then staying here at the Marriott is a fine option. Nice, friendly staff. Easy, fast breakfast. Decent room (however, the design was weird in my room.  The bathroom door blocked the other door so entry and exit were tricky.  Bad interior architecture.) Some noise, as mentioned by others, from the AC units and outside, but that's why this is a Courtyard Marriott and not a Ritz Carlton. I'll likely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your stay. You are correct, we are surrounded by so many Fortune 500 companies. Our location here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress is perfect for both the Leisure and the Business traveler. We hope to see you again soon and thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Great staff and accomodities. My stay was really pleasant. I really recommend this hotel,specially if your kids play basketball. The tournament was 10 minutes away only and is near to restaurants.. ..........................
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress!! We are a very popular destination for the basketball teams playing at the local venues. We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I was staying at at nearby hotel which was was going thru a major renovation(would have been nice to know beforehand). I called the hotel about 6am and spoke to Sammy.because there was no way I could spend the next couple nights there. Sammy told me I could come right over and check in and get into a room. That was great. I was checked in, up in my room before breakfast. The property seems to have been updated recently. Nice looking lobby, bar, lounge and bistro area. The room was nice and updated as well. I did have an issue with the A/C late at night and had to turn it off but the room stayed cool. I mentioned this to Sammy the next morning and when I got back to the room about 4pm I noticed that the A/C unit was replaced. If it wasn't for the new panel and a note from Eliseo
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. You are correct, we did undergo a full room renovation which was completed earleir this year. The lobby and meeting space with the addition of the Bistro and Full Bar was completed prior and the Starbucks is obviously a hit as well. With our sevenfloors, we found our renovation went very smoothly and we did warn all of our travelers before making their reservations that we will be under a renovation to give them the option before arriving to book elsewhere..  Our hotel does sellout quite a bit during the weekdays so we are very pleased that Sammy was able to get you in. We hope to see you again soon.  Again, thank you!

Summary: Overall the hotel was nice and the room comfortable. The hot breakfast was good however you were stuck with either french toast with strawberries or eggs, bacon/sausage and potatoes. probably prefer to mix it up a bit (hampton in down the road might have been a better choice). Stayed 3 days for business. Free popcorn and happy hour at the bar which I did not visit..too tired!  once thing I did not care for was the loud AC unit. When staying in a hotel, it is sometimes difficult to get to sleep especially if its not your regular bed. The unit is either on? or off! if its off, it gets kinda warm and stuffy. Fortunately I had my earplugs which helped reduce the noise factor.   All in all, it was comfortable but seeing that sleep is important, I probably will choose another place to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay.  We aplogize for the air conditioner issue and please note that we are working on this but it does take time and we are making progress.   You had also mentioned that the choices for breakfast were limited. We have over fourteen items on our menu in the Bistro including Oatmeal, Fresh fruit, Yogurt parfaits all the way to various breakfast sandwiches and a full breakfast cooked to order. It would be very helpful to us if you have suggestions for additional items that would please our travelers from a traveler's perspective.  I can be reached at 714 484-2502. Your comments are appreciated and hopefully we can get you to stay with us again!

Summary: I have been staying at the Hotel for a couple years. The staff is excellent !!!! I had a major problem with my laptop in August....The screen was broken on the plane ride from NYC to CA.I was very worried as I had a lot of reports to prepare over the weekend and needed a computer before Monday. Ian Kinsley was so so very helpful, he located a monitor, and I was able to  plug in my laptop and accomplished all my tasks before Monday AM. Additionally, he loaned me the monitor to bring to my office as the IT Dept would not open until later .His kindness will never be forgotten, even the people at my office could not believe it. Thanks Marriot Courtyard Cypress!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about our Front Office Manager, Ian, here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. He is definitely one of our unsung heros. Always going out of his way to help our guests and taking that extra step. We were not even aware that he had done this! I will make sure he gets a copy of your post along with our managment team.

Summary: It's my first night here. Frequent Marriott stays, our family are vacation club owners, so we rack up a lot of points. It's Saturday night, been driving all day, been sitting in LA traffic. Hotel is nice, clean, friendly staff. Check in was easy, went up to my room, changed and left. It was a little cool, so I increased the temp a little and put the fan on auto rather than just leave it on. When I got back, it's about 10 pm. There's some type of event, music is really loud. Up in my room, I can hear the music from downstairs. I'm on the 4th floor, by the way. Just noticed the ac is off and I can't seem to turn it back on. Probably can't do anything about it at this time of night. It's almost midnight and the music is still going. Not my idea of a relaxing stay after driving from
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize for noise level of the event going on in our ballroom. Please contact me at your earliest convenience 714 484-2502 or sally.brayton@dimdev.com to discuss further. Thank You- Sally

Summary: The Courtyard Cypress was clean in every sense of the word. My room was ready as soon as I arrived even when I arrived early. It was a perfect hotel for someone taking the family to Disneyland for the week. I stayed for 5 nights and was sad that my visit had to come to an end. I can't wait to find an opportunity or excuse to go back.   The entire staff was excellent and attentive to my every request.   Thank you for a wonderful stay. I look forward to a return in the near future.   Brady W.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to wrie a review and let us know about your stay here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We take great pride in the condition of our newly renovated hotel and ensure that our staff is trained well to make sure our guests are very comfortable. Again, thank you for staying with us!

Summary: Each time I travel to Cypress, I always stay at this Marriott and am always very pleased.  Excellent and helpful staff and management and always impeccably clean.  I like that...  I don't look at other hotels anymore...
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review of our hotel. We appreciate your your business and your loyalty to the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress!!

Summary: Upon entering and through our whole stay made us feel at "home". We were cheerfully greeted by every employee no matter where we were. The executive suite is worth the extra $10/night to have a separate living room, wet bar, sofa bed and TV, with the bedroom separated by French doors with a king bed and another TV. The bistro downstairs made the trip easy and relaxing with several breakfast items and Starbucks drinks to the beer, wine and appetizing dinner items. The place has been completely remodeled and refreshed and the air is so clean here. It's off the beaten path but close to other food options and Disneyland about a 5 minute drive. Small outdoor pool and jacuzzi but does its trick to make the evening refreshing. I've stayed at different Marriotts before but never a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. It sounds as though you were able to enjoy a majority of what we have to offer at our hotel. We hope to see you again and we will pass your comments on to our staff.  Again, thank you!!

Summary: This is a really nicely maintained facility with friendly staff.  The front deck check if folk were helpful  Dining is convenient and has good choices.  The ladies behind the counter are wonderful.  Service all quick and efficient.  I will be back.
Manager Response: The Courtyard by Marriott Cypress appreciates your wonderful comment. We take great pride in our newly renovated hotel and the well- trained staff. We hope you stay with us again soon.

Summary: I have stayed here for 10 weeks now. The hotel is conveniently located and easy to find. The staff are professional and friendly. Any and all concerns were immediately adressed and followed up on by managment. Will stay here anytime I am in town and will spread the word!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We appreciate your business and the great review.  We hope to see you here again soon!

Summary: Stayed here two nights for business.  The hotel is in a great location for business in Orange County.  Service is good and the room was clean and well appointed.  Cant think of a reason i would not come back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We hope to see you again soon and I will pass your comments on to the staff!

Summary: I stayed one night and then spent the whole next day at a meeting in their conference center. The staff was friendly and helpful. My room was clean and comfortable. Unlike a lot of hotel rooms they have plenty of easily accessible power outlets, which is great for those of us who travel with multiple electronic devices. On the negative side there was no safe in the room and the view out of my window was obstructed by some kind of equipment. The pool is pretty nice; it's not huge but at least it was long enough that I was able to swim some laps. Soundproofing was very good; I didn't hear any noise at night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review for the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We appreciate your great comments and do understand that there are some rooms on the second floor that do have an obstructed view.  We only utilize them in a sold out situation. Please contact me personally if you are returning and I will make sure you are not placed in one of those rooms. We appreciate your business. 714 484-2502

Summary Heading: The hotel is below normal courtyard experience.
Summary: Typically courtyard is very consistence in terms of its room. But I am a bit disappointed this time. Upon walking into the room, there were 2 bottled water full of dust on top. There are no safe inside the room.  The hotel staffs are ok, not the best not the worst.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and staying with us. I will bring the bottled water issue to the Executive Housekeeprs attention to ensure that the tops of the bottles are checked for dust. We do have safes available at the front desk for our guests convenience. We appreciate your business.

Summary: I was traveling for business and had the usual feeling of a lot of work and no play tiredness. The lobby area felt homey...can't explain quite why because it is very modern...but it did ...and the staff helped make it so with friendliness. My room was nice and very updated... the breakfast staff was especially welcoming and understands you are in a hurry Had to get there early to use a treadmill in the fitness center. I haven't stayed in a lot of Courtyards for business lately and this one felt safe and secure... Liked the area this was located in and not too hard a drive from John Wayne Airport...lots of good restaurants close by.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay and found our hotel comfortable. I will pass your great comments on to our staff and hope to see you here again in the future!

Summary: Very nice staff & clean room! Love the suite. It had king size bed and sofa bed. The room was separated from living room with french doors. It had a microwave, and fridge. Fridge was not very cold. We also used the hot tub and pool and both were very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your comments on your stay at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress. The compliments about our staff will be shared with them. Our suites are very popular and we are fortunate to have 24 of them. We do check the thermostats in our refrigerators checked periodically so we should be able to fix that issue however, if you can call me at 714 484-2502 with your last name we will be able to go specifically to the room you stayed in to check it. Thank you for staying with us and hope you make it back this way again.

Summary: Hotel is absolutely amazing. Staff was great, amenities like laundry, pool, and business center are excellent as well. The hotel also has a Starbucks inside it, it doesn't serve everything like a normal Starbucks but it serves enough. We didn't have breakfast but from the looks of things people were enjoying that as well. Brad (GM) was also excellent in making sure everything runs great.  Would recommend this hotel any day of the week.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great comments.  Starbucks has been a very popular addition to the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress as you can imagine. We are very proud of our Bistro serving breakfast and dinner and extremely fortunate to have Brad Heard as our General Manager who pays close attention to every detail. We hope to see you again soon if you are traveling back to our area.

Summary: I don't recall ever staying at a "Courtyard" property, but I have stayed at Marriott and Marriott Signature properties many times. This particular property was very "blah".  It feels outdated and cheaply done.  I suppose it's catering to a particular crowd but it's not a place I would stay again if I can avoid it.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments. Courtyards are designed specifically for the corporate guest in mind with all of the needs available for the business traveler. As a traveler used to staying at our Signature Marriotts and full service hotels you will notice the difference however, we do have the pool, whirpool, exercise facility, laundry, bistro and 4000 sq ft of meeting space utilized for special events such as weddings etc.  We just completed our renovation in January of this year with the Marriott "package". We understand that everyone has different taste in decor.  We do  appreciate your business and thank you again for taking the time to reach out to us with your comments.

Summary Heading: Helpful & pleasant staff makes a difference!
Summary: We stayed four nights here. No matter when I went to the desk for assistance, the staff was always super! They gave great suggestions for the nearest beach/boardwalk eateries. Offered towels when I told the we were going to the beach. One of the best things was being able to take a short 10-15 drive to the hotel after a FULL day of Disney Land & California Adventure Park. The beds were firm (not squishy!) We rested well every night! We got on the elevator one day and was  excited to meet a LA Dodger dressed in his uniform headed to work. The laundry facilities were reasonable and convenient. The fitness center was nice, all equipment worked properly. It was two groups of us and we were totally satisfied. Although the immediate area is not in a tourist area (multiple
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review. Here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress, we take great pride in our staff and how they go that extra mile for our guests.  The convenience of being just a little out of the beaten path of Disneyland and not having to pay for parking at so many of the local hotels in addition to a lower tax rate does make a difference. We hope you are able to visit us again soon!

Summary: Really Great place with awesome staff, specifically Sammy. She was super helpful and really nice to us, i don't think id ever gotten such good service at a hotel. The rooms were nice and clean too, with a nice modern art statue to admire.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. I will pass your wonderful comments on to our staff and will acknowledge Sammy. We constantly receive comments on our service and take great pride knowing our ongoing training pays off. Sammy is definitely a favorite!! We hope you are going to come back and visit us again soon.

Summary: I was here for 3 days for a family reunion and I had an awesome time. Mostly because the service was great and the rooms were lovely. I had an upgraded room on the 7th floor. My two small children enjoyed the pool and the food.  Thanks for your excellent customer service.
Manager Response: We are glad that you enjoyed your stay here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. I am not sure which room you were in but if you were on the East side of the hotel you and your children had the opportunity to watch the nightly fireworks from Disneyland through your window. Maybe you were actually at Disneyland being only seven miles down Katella!! We hope you are able to return and visit us again!  Thank you for your review and staying with us.

Summary: My team usually stay in Long Beach area for the Dragon Boat Festival. This year I decide to change things up.    The Group sales Manager provided excellent customer service  booking my team at the Courtyard.  They also provided breakfast a hour early for the guests before heading to the festival.  The hotel is clean, rooms are spacious, and the staff is friendly. My teammates are also saying the same thing about the hotel.  I would recommend this hotel to all my friends, family and trip advisors members.   Thank you Cheryl for making the arrangements for my team.
Manager Response: Thank you for driving just a little further from your venue to stay with us at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress.  We have been enjoying the Dragon Boat Racers for many years and they all work with Cherie Sorrentino. She goes over every last detail to ensure that your stay is enjoyable and your team is sucessful in meeting all of your plans and timelines.  We hope to see you again next year.  We appreciate your business!

Summary Heading: Wedding with out of town guests.
Summary: We recently got married in Alaska and wanted to have a reception with friends and family close to home.  We looked at a lot of local hotels in the area before we chose the Cypress Courtyard.  We worked very close with the Catering Manger Silena Blan.  She and her staff did an excellent job of taking care of all the details.  Our guests have not stopped talking about how good the food was and how much fun they had.  We had out of town guests that reserved rooms and loved them.   For a bride, I can tell you it was wonderful to work with this hotel because I did not have to worry about anything, and they were able to accomodate all the small details we asked for.  I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone who is holding a banquet of any size or having guests who need a nice
Manager Response: Best wishes on your new life together. We are thrilled that we were able to be part of your big event. Silena and her staff work very hard to make sure your special evening is a memorable one. With all you have to do, knowing you are in good hands makes such a big difference.   Thank you for your review and it will be shared with all of the employees who came in contact with you and your guests here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress.

Summary: Looked for a nice place, with in the budget, and close to Disney and the other Anaheim area attractions. Landed at the Courtyard Marriott Cypress as it met all those objectives. Brand name close to everything, cant go wrong...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress worked out with your travel plans. Hope to see you on your next visit!

Summary: We recently visited Disneyland and stayed at Courtyard Marriott in Cypress CA.   The staff was excellent and the room was comfortable, clean and newly remodeled.  Being located just a couple miles from Disneyland allowed us to return to the hotel in the afternoon to rest and enjoy the pool and spa, then return to Disney refreshed for the rest of the day and evening.  The bistro made it easy to grab a quick meal before heading out in the morning or a snack in the afternoon.   There are also plenty of nearby restaurants, which are much more reasonably priced than the meals at Disneyland.  The friendly staff and comfortable room made our days at Disneyland much more enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review of our Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. You have definitely uncovered one of the best kept secrets around the Cypress/ Anaheim area.   Not only are we less than seven miles from Disneyland, there is a public bus (OCTA # 50) that runs to and from just outside our door, up and down Katella every 25 minutes!!   We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and discovered the convenience of being able to just drive down Katella to us and utilize our Bistro and surrounding restaurants. Thank you again.

Summary: We did not end up staying at this location because they were fully booked. However, one of their employees, Cherie Sorrentino, was so sympathetic to the fact that she could not offer us a room that she did some checking for us. She asked where we were coming from, where we were scheduled to play (our son's soccer tournament), suggested alternate hotels and provided their phone numbers. If this is an indication of the type of service that you get at the Cypress Courtyard, I'll be sure to check them out on our next trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to compliment our Group Sales Manager, Cherie Sorrentino. She has been here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress for nearly 10 years and works extremely hard to ensure that all of her sports teams get their reservations in. Unfortunately she is unable to get them all because we do tend to sellout on these big tournament weekends. I have an office next to hers and I do hear her working with the team organizers to give them other options in the area. She genuinely cares and goes out of her way to assist all of the teams. Again, thank you and hopefully we get you in here next time!

Summary: I've stayed at various Marriott Hotels all over the world and have usually enjoyed and have been impressed with their 5 star standards and service.  This particular Marriott in Cypress, CA has neither high standards nor a memorable service from their staff.  This is a simple generic hotel with nothing exceptional or memorable.  The staff is young and pleasant but not very capable.  I waited at least 30 min for them to check me in and I was not clear why it took so long.  The quality of the food served at room service was extremely average; the food was unappealing and expensive. But, I was happy with the hotel's wifi, which was free and fast.  However, the overall experience was just ok for me.  Nothing was really wrong with the experience but for the price, nothing really stood
Manager Response: Please contact me to further discuss your issue at check-in in. I do not see a reservation under the name utilized in this post. Thank You- Sally  714 484-2502

Summary Heading: Great Customer Service and a very nice Hotel
Summary: This was my first time setting up a huge meeting for my sales team and Cherie and Silena were so kind, accommodating and patient with me as I did this for the first time. They helped guide me and lent me advice, The customer service I received was excellent.  I received a tour of the hotel,and quick replies addressing my questions and concerns via email or phone calls.  They were very professional and I even received a big Thank you from my boss who said everything went great. I highly recommend the Courtyard Marriott for their service and accommodations. The Vice President of our company even stays here every time he comes in to town. Thanks again everyone at Cypress Courtyard! Great Job!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for booking your meeting and block of rooms here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. I have passed your comments on to Silena and Cherie. They are a great team and work well together to make sure your meeting is a success. Please let us know when we can be of service in the future. We appreciate your business!!

Summary: We had an office meeting in one of the conference rooms at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress. From the first phone call to the time we left, we had a wonderful experience! I booked this room through the catering staff member, Silena Blan, and she was extremely helpful and polite. There was a food area in the lobby for a bite of breakfast or a morning coffee, juice or other drink. I would recommend this place to anyone for business and based on the way we were treated, I would have no hesitation with a referral to stay in the hotel for travelers. The only down side was that my bosses wife prefers Coke over Pepsi and Marriott is a Pepsi serving establishment.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress.  We are very proud of our staff and we enjoy hearing the compliments. Cherie and Silena are a great team and work together to ensure that our corporate clients are well taken care of.  Please let your boss know that next time you plan a meeting here, we will have his soft drink choice available to him!!

Summary: They are friendly, helpful and accommodating. Friendly, helpful staff. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Located near plenty of food (Mostly fast food, but that's helpful on late night runs). They also serve great food in their lobby until 10 p.m.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review. The Courtyard by Marriott Cypress takes great pride in our staff and the fact that we have the Marriott ongoing training available throughout the year. I will pass these comments onto them and hope to see you here again soon.

Summary: I'm a wheelchair bound traveler, and my stay at the Marriott was an excellent experience.  This was my first travel experience since my handicap and I must say that Ian the manager at the Marriott and everyone of his staffers were so helpful, pleasant and made my stay there as if I was at home.  I truly recommend anyone whether it be for business or pleasure to give Marriott a try they are the best!
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice comments. I do know that our Front Office Manager, Iam Kinsley did make sure that your room was exactly what you would need for your stay. I will share this with Iam as well as the rest of our staff and management!

Summary Heading: Newly remodeled lobby with beautiful amenities
Summary: I've been staying at this location for many years while in CA, and this was a lovely surprise. The lobby has a beautiful breakfast cafe serving Starbucks, wi-fi off to one side, a place to pick up your boarding passes, a quiet lounge in one far corner, and a large screen that greets you upon entering that contains a map, the weather, latest news and just about anything else you'd want to know about the area. Very convenient to the OC entertainment areas, yet very quiet at night. Kudos to this location for modernizing this location.
Manager Response: First of all thank you for your loyalty to our Courtyard by Marriott here in Cypress. We appreciate your comments. We are very excited about our recent renovation. The Go Board (big screen) in our Lobby is a very popular feature. It has just about all the information you would need as an out of towner. Places to go, maps, news etc. I will pass on your compliments to our staff!!

Summary: This was my 2nd visit to this Courtyard.  I have nothing but good things to say about my 2 week stay.   Everyone was extremely friendly and professional.  The food service was fast and high quality.   I have friends going there over the 4th of July based on my experience.
Manager Response: Here at the Courtyard Cypress we appreciate it when our guests take the time to let us know how their stay was.  Thank you for your kind words.. We do hope that you were able to visit some of our great restaurants nearby for lunch. Our Bistro is open everyday for breakfast and dinner along with our 24 hour Market stocked with freshly made salads, sandwiches and much more. Again, thank you for your comments and hopefully we will see you again!.

Summary Heading: Very Nice and Well Maintained Property
Summary: Stayed here on business trip. Very convienient to the location of my buisness trip. Good food options in the morning. Clean rooms and very helpful staff. Would return if the need arises. Although I didn't go there it is close to the Disneyland in Anahiem area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. Here at the Courtyard Cypress, we take great pride in our well maintained hotel and our Guest Scores definitely reflect our ongoing progress. Hopefully you can return and take time to visit  nearby Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm!!

Summary: This hotel was nice.  No free breakfast, but the room was clean.  We used a king size bed room.  It was laid out kind of weird. Few plugs near mirrors.  This would not have been a good room for a "girls weekend".  Not enough mirror/plug access.  But otherwise it was a nice place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response!  Courtyards generally do not offer complimentary breakfast however, we do have special rates in place for the summer that do include breakfast for one traveler and up to four as well.  Wow- girls getaway and not enough outlets - I agree that must have been tough- we just aren't used to all that excitement!! Usually one hair dryer, electric shaver going on here but please- next time you visit the Courtyard Cypress let me know- I will get some power strips up there and a bottle of wine for you!!   (714) 484-2502

Summary: I booked my son into this hotel because it was one of the designated Tournament Hotels for an event that he participated in. Not being old enough to rent a car, he needed a place that would transport him to and from the venue. After multiple conversations with the front desk staff, they assured me that their shuttle van would provide transportation for my son and others in the hotel that also needed transportation. After the first day the shuttle broke down, and these college aged kids were left stranded, or at least without a fall back position for the notoriously unreliable other college aged kids that did have cars and offered transportation. The hotel was booked solid because of this event. So I think they could have rented a van to replace the one that ended up in the shop
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your concerns. We apologize for the inconvenience of transporting your son and one other archer back to the hotel when our shuttle broke down. Thankfully, they did get back with the other archers who had cars. Since this incident, we have ordered a new van.  Thank you for making your reservation with us and I will pass on the praises to our staff about your kind words.

Summary: I stayed from Apr 14 till 18, 2014. The staffs were really nice and always trying to assist me. Room was very clean and bed was also very comfortable. I choosed this hotel only because of location, but I felt very happy to stay this hotel and will come again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and glad to know you enjoyed your stay here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We hope you are able to return for another visit soon.

Summary: The entire staff excelled at being thoughtful, competent, kind, and diligent in efforts to provide memorable stay. 5 days and 4 nights here have been the best stay of my past 12 business trips. General Manager Gil, Sales Manager Cherie, Banquet Support Humberto, Food Services Sylvia, Front Desk Lareyna and Emeline, Housekeeping Linsey all hustled above and beyond during 200 person conference event. The personal touch made this facility top-notch, how all organizations serving the public should earn future business and superb reputation.
Manager Response: thank you for taking the time to write this great review. Here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress, we appreciate it when a guest points out to us the highlights of their stay. We take great pride in the dedication of our staff and how they ensure that our meeting rooms, catering, service and sleeping rooms are top notch. We will make sure they are recognized for a job well done.

Summary: The front desk clerks were outstanding.  The rooms are clean and the bathrooms have the typical plush Marriott towels and robes.  Paul Mitchell brand for the shampoo was a first for us and it made my wife excited.  The television was gigantic.  My wife and I had more fun in our room then we did at the local attraction!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We take great pride in the amount of training our emplyees go through to ensure your stay is all that you expected. We hope to see you again soon.
