Summary: My family stayed here last week 2/17-2/22. Due to our fun-filled 4 full Disneyland days we didn't spend much time at the hotel, but when we did it was perfect for our needs. Our 2 girls slept in blowup toddler beds on the floor and the bed was the best hotel bed I have slept in. Not many miles from Disneyland this is a quiet hotel mostly filled with business travelers. Parking is free and although in a good location traffic is minimal. The staff was awesome always greeting us with a smile as we came and went. Will stay here again on our next Disneyland adventure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. We have been receiving rave reviews on our newly renovated rooms. We hope to see you here again very soon!!

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here this past weekend (2/20-2/23) for my birthday weekend. We're from NorCal and this location was definitely perfect for our adventures. It's not far from Disneyland, which was only about 15 minutes! Not far from Knotts either. This hotel is not hard to find and again, this location in Cypress is perfect. It's not on a busy street and there's no traffic going towards here (from our experience). Parking is free.  Upon entering, there is a big touch screen tv to see the weather, hotel's cafe menu, and other things. This hotel accepted our late check-in and was very nice about it! Our room was located on the 5th floor. Our window view was the pool! The rooms were very, very nice! The bathroom had a cute Paul Mitchell shampoos/conditioners and smelled
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review- here at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress, we take great pride in our hotel and what we have to offer. We are changing the sliders on the TV's to correct the problems experienced in some of our rooms from our recent renovation. Sorry about your ice cream! Come back and I'll get you and your boyfriend a huge Chocolate Sundae!!!

Summary: The Hotel is OK, The rooms look recently refitted, everything clean, and working, shower was fine, not the best but not the worst.  air con is provided in rooms but its one of the typical through window units, don't expect to be able to talk in the room when its on, nevermind sleep..  The restaurant if it can be called that is a hugely disappointing, its more of a Bar / fast food take away, the Menu for breakfast lunch and dinner are seriously limited, which means if you want even a steak you will need to go via car, although there is a Mexican right next door.  Swimming area was good, and of course plenty of car parking.  The internet is free, which is a good job because it seems as if the whole hotel is sharing a 2 Meg line....
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. We are very excited that our renovation is completed and we have a beautiful, fresh hotel to show off. The Courtyard brand features a Bistro and is a Marriott standard in over 85% of its hotels. You are correct, they are not considered restaurants but provide a wide range of options for breakfast and dinner with freshly made salads, sandwiches, chicken and ribs etc.   Another great feature of the Courtyards is the GoBoard where we have listed many restaurants in our area which includes a great steakhouse only one mile away.   We hope that you visit us again!

Summary: Great location close to all the attractions in Anaheim and Buena park, if you get a high floor you can see the fireworks from Disneyland every night.  The hotel itself was clean and the staff was pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great comments. We hope you enjoyed our newly renovated sleeping rooms as of January 4th. We are very fortunate to be located only four miles from Knott's Berry Farm and seven miles from Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center. The staff and management here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress/Anaheim appreciates not only your kind comments, but your business as well..

Summary: On our last leg of our SoCal trip, we spent a couple of nights at this Courtyard.  Our great experience with the Courtyard in Ventura carried us over to this one.  The fresh paint smell was faint in the room.  Since it was our first stay at this Courtyard, we can't compare its before and after.  The lobby's Bistro was our go-to place for breakfast.  The interactive screen when you first walk in is slick and helpful.  It was like having a large tablet on a wall.
Manager Response: It sounds as though both our Courtyard by Marriot Cypress and Ventura made you a fan!! Thank you for your review and good to hear that you enjoyed your stay. The Bistro serving breakfast, dinner and cocktails along with Starbucks has been a huge hit and definitely sets us apart from the others. We hope to see you back again and have a happy New Year!

Summary: This is a convenient and nice property located in Cypress, CA. Convenient because it's close to our daughter, so we use it for overnight stays several times a year.  Pro's: They are undergoing a refurbishing which means nice rooms and beds on the appropriate floors. But be sure to ask for the rooms that have already been done. The reception desk automatically made sure that we got one of those rooms. Con's: They don't offer the free coffee in the lobby that they used to, thus ensuring better business for their bar area. Overall a very good choice for a place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Here is the great news we have all been waiting for at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress, - The Renovation is finally done!! We are like a brand new hotel with every sleeping room completely renovated from top to bottom with an addition of microwaves and small refrigerators. You are correct, we do not serve complimentary coffee in the lobby however, we do have it available in the sleeping rooms and we do servre Starbucks in our Bistro! Hope to see you back again.

Summary: Just finishing a redo - this is a nice business hotel. Very convenient to my office and the beds are super comfy. Breakfast options are great and parking is free. I have no complaints and would recommend for business travel to this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments and so glad to hear you were able to experience our newly renovated sleeping room. We only have one more floor to do and this project will be complete! The Courtyard by Marriott Cypress will be a brand new hotel!!!! Thank you for your business and Happy Holidays.

Summary: I have come to Cypress a couple times a year for several years on business and always stay at this hotel. I have to say I love the newly renovated rooms. The bed was so comfortable I didn't want to get out of it. The bed linens were soft and cozy. The french doors separating the seating area from the sleeping area is great with a large TV in each space. NICE! Good water pressure in the shower and the water was nice and warm. It's now more like a mini suite, than just a room. The bar/breakfast area was remodeled within the last year or so and is also inviting with couch seating for a group of people to sit and visit and watch a ball game or table seating to enjoy the food or Starbucks coffee in the morning for breakfast. There is a pool and exercise facility, free newspapers near
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write this wonderful review. Here at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress, we take great pride in our hotel and the staff and management are all very excited about our new renovation as well. We have so many guests just like you, who have been staying with us, returning and so surprised to see all the changes. Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you here again very soon.

Summary Heading: Same as other reviews - nice lobby. rooms need an update
Summary: I will not harp on the rooms as I understand renovation began in October a mere few weeks after my visit.  This hotel was very well located close to where I was conducting business so proximity was an important factor.  The room was OK but need refurbishment.  I would think that once the renovations are complete and if prices remain competitive, this will be a good choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. I am so sorry you were not able to experience one of our newly renovated sleeping rooms. The project will be completed in the next few weeks. Unfortunately you stayed with us before we had completed a floor or two. At this point we are about 80% done and we have had nothing but rave reviews!!  Please contact me if you have another trip to the area planned. Sally 714 484-2502

Summary: So far, so good...after eight hours on the road, we were greeted with a smiling face - a very bright, happy smile.   That means a lot to an exhausted family of five.  The front desk clerk Ruta assigned us to one of the newly-renovated rooms on the 7th floor without being asked.    The room smells of new wood, and is clean.    Will update this review after our stay...but really looking forward to a relaxing stay while we enjoy Disneyland during the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for the the great review. We are very excited about our new room renovation and have enjoyed hearing the wonderful comments. Ruta will be made aware of your comment. She is our Evening Manager and we are very proud of her!!

Summary Heading: Great staff at Marriot- Cypress CA
Summary: I occupied one of  rooms the 6th floor, the staff at Marriot was exceptional and very helpful, luxurious hotel, money was well spent, great location, the welcome was great, I enjoy the great service Sammy really gave me the assistance that I needed. I will recommend this hotel to any one.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for posting a review about our newly renovated sleeping rooms here at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress. We are very excited to show off these rooms to our guests. We will definitely share your great comments with our staff!

Summary: My room on the 6th floor is the nicest Courtyard room I have ever stayed in. Travelling for business, I stay at many Courtyards! The rooms are freshly remodeled and are very clean, new and nice. The welcome was great too...they give you a cute treat that is specialized with your own name printed in the item. A very special touch. While checking in, Sammy Toa was so friendly and took extra time explaining the ammenitites and making me feel at home. I will definitely be back! Thank you!
Manager Response: This is so exciting- a compliment on our newly renovated sleeping room!! Thank you so much- we are very excited that the completion is near and we will soon have the opportunity to show off these new rooms to all of our guests here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress. The addition of the microwaves and refrigerators will really be a plus. I will make sure that our staff gets a copy of your comments. Thank you for taking the time to write us and recognizing our wonderful employees!!

Summary: I enjoy staying at Marriot properties. Sammy Toa, always, always goes out of her way to make me feel special. And, it is not just me. I have observed Sammie spreading her warmth and smile to everyone she comes in contact with. Every employer wishes they had staff as wonderful as Sammy. She has earned and deserves a financial raise, public/peer appreciation and recognized for her stellar performance, time after time.  Good job Sammie!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for recognizing our "Star" Sammy Toa here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress! We realize how fortunate we are to have an employee like her and get many, many compliments!!  This will go into her folder and we will definitely share your comments. She will be very pleased .

Summary: My family and I frequent this site as we live in the Bakersfield area but have season passes to Disneyland and use this site as "home" when visiting.  I have a wife and 2 young children (3 & 5) and every time we stay here the staff makes us feel like we are at our own home. We always see the same familiar faces but the best is seeing Sammy Toa an employee at your front desk. She always makes our stay as comfortable and convenient as possible with the best hospitality you can expect in a hotel. We are planning many trips in the future to Disneyland and as long as you continue to have service like we‚Äôve experienced the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress will be our home away from home.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your great review. Here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress we are so proud of our staff and Sammy Toa is a "star" We will definitely recognize her for her outstanding service. We hope you and your family return soon to see our newly renovated sleeping rooms!!

Summary: My husband I stayed at this hotel for the second time. It is not a five star hotel but we enjoy the convenience of the 5 minute walk to Disneyland. The pool and spa are nice. We rarely took advantage of the happy hour they had nightly. The bed was firm and surprisingly comfortable but the shower wasn't as luxurious as expected. The tub was fairly clean....and the bathroom lighting over the mirrors were fairly bright. I would recommend this hotel for the parking convenience, the friendly staff, and the convenient location to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response and so glad you enjoyed your stay!! Hope you can return in the future and experience our newly renovated sleeping rooms!

Summary: This was 2nd stay and again I was greeted by two friendly helpful staff members, Sammy and Emkine, they made check in after a long travel day from the eastcoast very pleasent. They helped me find great area resturants. The Hotel is very clean with nice rooms. The cafe staff was also great and the food tasted great as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response and so nice to see you had returned. Hopefully you will be back again to see our newly renovated rooms equipped with small refrigerators and microwaves!!

Summary: I stayed here one night this summer and accidentally left my new IPad in the dining room fairly late.  We checked out the next day and I didn't realize what had happened until I returned home.  I called the hotel, and the IPad had been found by a staff member. It was turned into Lost and Found, and was waiting for me when I drove back there a day or two later.  I offered to pay a reward and they asked me instead to just share the experience on this site.  Special thanks go to "Alicia", "Jonathan" and "Silena" for being so honest.  I wish you all the best. John McDonald
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress, we take great pride in our staff and we are so glad that you were able to retrieve your IPad. Please visit us again and you will see our newly renovated rooms since you were here last!!

Summary: Very excellent customer service. The hotel staff was very friendly and polite. I wished we stayed at a residence inn because we needed a fridge and microwave. Very nice lounge area. Had a cafe but not something we used.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Here at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress we take great pride in our friendly staff and often receive nice comments about how they tend to go out of their way to assist our guests. I am not sure if you had asked for a small refigerator and we might have been out of them but we do have them available at no extra chearge. The good news is that we are under renovation and when it is completed in December all of our rooms wiill have microwaves and small refigerators. Hopefully you will be returning to see this transformation!

Summary Heading: I will definitely stay here again
Summary: I loved this hotel and the staff. It was clean, nice, easy to get to and the staff were phenomenal. Everyone took the time to see that my stay was a good one.   The cafe served very good food.   The only reason it did 4 stars instead of 5 was an issue with my shower. The fitting was loose and I couldn't get the shower to come on. I had to call down to get it fixed. Someone did come up and get it to work for me, which was great, but it was a bit inconvenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. The Courtyard by Marriott Cypress takes great pride in ensuring that our guests are comfortable. We appreciate your business and are very excited about our upcoming sleeping room renovation beginning October 1st with the addition of microwaves and small refrigerators. We hope you will be able to return so we can show it off to you!

Summary Heading: Beautiful Lobby - Rundown Rooms - Disrespectful GM
Summary: Well, you walk in and are like - whoa this is nice, big screen TV info center, nice check in... Then you have to stay.  You get to your floor and the hallway is a nice, balmy, 87 degrees (I checked) and the front desk tells you, there is nothing they can do about it, they don't set the AC. Well, at least you have a thermostat in the room.  The poor layout of that room is the second shock, a desk opposite the entryway door. Turn on the lights to read - well, it appears they replaced the real bulbs with CF bulbs, but did not take into account the lower level and quality of light. The room is vastly under lit, even with all the lights on. Try shaving with sunglasses on for a simulation.  Well, the bed is OK (except for the scratchy cover sheet which you can just throw to the floor)
Manager Response: We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced. Please be assured that your identification or any other guest in our hotel was not compromised in any way. All of our computers are password protected and paperwork is not left out on the counters for view. We are getting ready for our complete room renovation on October 1st and the hallway air conditioning units have all been checked and fixed where needed.

Summary: Our stay was terrific with a huge two room suite that was very clean and enjoyable! Great authentic Mexican food restaurant next door within a two minute walking distance. Staff very helpful. Thanks for a comfortable travel hotel experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Courtyard by Marriott in Cypress and for taking the time to write a review. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay and hopefully, if you return you are going to be pleasantly surprised that we are renovating our sleeping rooms beginnning October 1st and we are going to be very excited about showing them off!! Refrigerators and Microwaves in all the rooms!!. We appreciate your business!!!

Summary: My father, daughter, and I came to stay for a few nights as part of an annual vacation we take together.  We found a vacation package price on Expedia that included the Courtyard by Marriott.  Given the very positive reviews on TripAdvisor, we decided to book it.    I've stayed at several Residence Inns, Courtyards by Marriott, and Holiday Inn Expresses.  This hotel was one of my least favorites.  We had a king suite room (hide-a-bed in the living area, and king bed in separate bedroom).  Because the windows were on the bedroom side, the living room area was really dark and depressing.  It was an area that you didn't really want to be in.  The light was so dim that my father had difficulty reading in there.    Also, the air conditioner is was very loud, so that every time it
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, We do apologize for housekeeping calling your room while your father was asleep to see if there was anything you needed. The majority of the time the guests are out for the day so they were not aware someone was sleeping in the room. We have also addressed the staff in the Bistro and again, apologize that your father was not offered water before it was open. Courtyards are not designed to offer complimentary breakfast but we do offer fresh, healthy choices from our Bistro. It generally allows us to pass on the savings in the rate over a Residence Inn because we do understand the cost in purchasing breakfast for a family. Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: I stayed here for business at the last minute since it was convenient for visiting a customer after trying the Hyatt House around the corner (see my review about that fiasco).  I was able to get the last King room for a AAA rate of $107/night and like most other Courtyards, it has the bistro and typical new Courtyard lobby.  The room was spacious, clean and comfortable.  The staff were friendly and helpful and it was overall a pleasant stay.  There are plenty of restaurants in the area and some are within walking distance.  The El Torito is very close if you want mediocre Mexican food with mediocre service.  I will return next time visiting the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Lucky for us that we awere able to accomodate you during a sold out week. We are looking forward to showing off our renovated sleeping rooms beginning October 1st. We will have refirigerators and microwaves in all of our rooms. Please contact me if you will be returning soon. We will be working on one floor at a time so we will be able to show off our new sleeping rooms and I want to make sure you are one of the first if you are here in October.  Thank you for the business- we really appreciate it!! Sally 714 484 2502

Summary Heading: Good for kids and okay for adults
Summary: We stayed here for a three day weekend to attend a wedding. My wife and I stayed I one room and our two daughters w/families stayed in individual rooms.  Each daughter has three kids.  Two 4 year olds and a 3 year old in one room.  The kids trashed the room everyday and the staff cleaned it up each day.  Excellent house cleaning.  There were lots of kids staying this weekend.  Baseball teams, soccer teams, and boating teams.  The hallways got noisy but our room was surprisingly quiet.  The pool was full but the kids loved it.  We did not eat at the hotel.  The breakfast and lunch menus were limited but lots of great places very nearby.  The hotel provided a shuttle to the wedding which was a big plus.  I would stay again as long as the price was still competitive.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We read your comments to the staff and we really got a kick out of your statement- "The kids trashed the room everyday and the staff cleaned it up" You obviously, enjoyed your stay and you are right, it was a weekend with a lot of sports teams etc in - nice to hear your kids fit right in to the fun and frolics!! You mentioned that your room had a small refrigerator and a microwave- the good news is all of our rooms will have those items soon because we are about to have all of our sleeping rooms renovated this fall!! We hope to see you and your family again- Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: My family stayed at the Courtyard Marriott Cypress with our 10U and 12U Softball teams. My family had a single bedroom with foldout couch. The bed was plenty comfortable and the foldout was good enough for the kiddos. The rooms were clean and adequate sized. We had a small kitchenette with a microwave, sink and fridge. We thoroughly enjoyed chilling our water for the day's activities in our mini fridge. All the families enjoyed the breakfast before our games which gave the girls the needed nutrition before hitting the fields. On a couple of occasions I asked for additional towels (poolside and in the workout room) in both cases, the staff brought them to me within minutes. The staff was extra friendly and offered additional services after completing each previous request. On the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience here at the Courtyard. We have a lot of sports teams stay with us throughout the year and they do tend to enjoy the room type you had chosen which is our suite with the rooms divided by a French door. We hope to see you again for your next tournament!! Again, thank you for writing us-

Summary: The lobby has been refreshed (with the exception of the restaurant/bistro area). The rest of the property is about due. I wouldn't stay at full price but visiting a local customer and their negotiated discount was acceptable. Staff pleasant and helpful. No courtesy van to airport. An average property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response. We take great pride in our recent renovation featuring the Courtyard by Marriott Refreshing Business Concept which also included the new Bistro serving freshly made, healthier choices. It is one of our most popular additions to our lobby. We are very excited that the renovation of our sleeping rooms is slated to take place in the next several months and at that time we will have a completely renovated hotel.  Hopefully, if visiting your local company again you will stay with us and see our progress. Our shuttle is available for transportation to and from local businesses within a five mile radius.

Summary: On a whim we decided to take a weekend and go to Disneyland. I read over several reviews of hotels in the area and decided that a little drive was better than paying double (or more) for a room that was walking distance from the park. The staff here was very friendly and informative. They even called our room after check to be sure that it was acceptable. We have stayed here a couple of times now and it will always be my first choice when in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience in this forum and making us your first choice. You are right, our rates are much more reasonable than most of the Anaheim/Disneyland hotels, especially this time of year. We also offer complimentary parking and being only seven miles away makes us a very popular choice for guests visiting not only Disneyland but Knott's Berry Farm less than four miles away. Again, thank you for your comments!

Summary: As a platnium member of Marriott, I have stayed in many Courtyards and other brands of Marriott but I have never seen any bed bugs.  I actually saw and killed a couple then put one in a plastic bag alive so that the front desk could see it.  They sent me to another local Hotel and refunded my money but I am really getting concerned with the Marriott brand and how some of it's hotels across the country are not, by any means, living up to what the Marriott brand use to stand for. SCARY!
Manager Response: We would like to apologize for your experience here at our hotel.  I am glad that we at least were able to send you to the Residence Inn right down the street.  After you left we had the room inspected and then reinspected and on both occasions the inspectors were unable to find any insects.  We continue to monitor the room and check for bugs but so far we have been bug free.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay.  They care about their guests.
Summary: We called the Courtyard about midnight, the place we had planned to stay was too dirty and horrible.  My husband had to work the next morning and they let us check in at 8am.  We were greeted with respect, concern for our travel problem and all staff were polite and nice. The breakfast and lounge areas are quiet and comfortable.  You can relax, the food served is good, there is a market store to get anything you need.  The staff asked how I was doing each day, a very caring attitude.  Clean and quiet.  Thank you for coming to our help and Thanks again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for writing a review.  It is good to hear that our staff  took good care of you and that we were able to get you that early check-in. We take pride in our hotel and our employees.

Summary: Sandie, Sally and Cherie were attentive to our needs, clearly understood and provided the service that allowed us to focus on the mission and successfully execute the intended outreach to customers and stakeholders of ESGR who attended our event.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We were proud to be part of your program.  We salute and support the Los Alamitos Joint Forces Training Base in your efforts to assist in finding jobs for our returning Soldiers and Veterans. In any way we can- We All Serve!!!

Summary Heading: Best place to stay for business or leisure
Summary: This hotel is a perfect place to stay if you come to Long Beach for a Dragon Boat competition or just to take your family to Disneyland etc...  The hotel is situated in a very convenient location, the lobby is an awesome place to hangout or just walk to restaurants nearby to wind down from a busy day.  The staffs are friendly and very professional; if you need a great group rate, just talk to the Sales manager, you wouldn't be able to find a better deal for a place like this anywhere else in the neighbor hood.  Lana Walther AZ Dragon Riders' Captain
Manager Response: Thank you so much for writing this wonderful review. We enjoy having the Dragon Boat Race travelers at our hotel year after year and I know that our Sales Manager, Cherie Sorrentino, enjoys working closely with you as well as other sports teams to ensure a comfortable stay. We know how important it is during competition and look forward to seeing you again!!

Summary: Just stayed for 2 nights with a large group and everything was great!  I was very impressed by the lobby area, which included lots of comfortable seating, computer access, a bar and a cafe.  The cafe serves Starbucks coffee, which is always a bonus for me.  The staff was friendly and attentive.  The location was convenient for us getting to Knott's Berry Farm and there was a good selection of restaurants and stores near by.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing your group to us and for taking the time to post a comment here in TripAdvisor. It is nice to see that you were able to utilize our Courtyard Refreshing Business concept. We are very proud of our Bistro and the Eat Drink and Connect opportunity to help make it a comfortable stay for our guests. Again, thank you for staying with us, your business is appreciated.

Summary: Have been staying here for over 2 1/2 years. Hotel is always clean, quiet, and a pleasure to stay at.   The staff is always fantastic. They are the most friendly group I've encountered in 12 plus years of travel.   Checked in tonight, after not being here for a couple of weeks, Justin, and Alicia greeting me by name as they always do, with their sincere friendlessness reminded me why I enjoy being here more then any other hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback- we definiitely consider our TripAdvisor comments as our report card. We appreciate the fact that you have been staying with us for over two years. I will pass your comments onto Justin and Alicia as well as the entire staff.

Summary: This hotel is great. New lobby with modern look. The rooms need some work, but their clean. The front desk made my stay wonderfull. Eduardo, Alicia and even the night manager Justin made me fell at home. The restaurant girls are very helpfull aswell.(Forgot names sorry) These guys truely care about their work and their guest.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor. We are always excited to hear that our staff goes out of their way to make our guests feel at home. This will be passed on to Eduardo, Alicia, Justin, Mary and Deshara. Thank you for staying with us and hope you will be able to come back soon SB

Summary: The night shift at the Courtyard is excellent. I visit often with co workers that stay here all the time. Any time we need a good place to eat eather Justin the night manager or Eduardo always recommend a great place to eat, both are verry helpful and will go out of their way to help us. The girls at the Bistro are great as well, fast service and food is always excellent. The hotel is great always clean and has a nice and modern lobby, great place to relax. I would recommend this place to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing our great staff members. We are very fortunate to have the Marriott training available and it is always comforting to see that our guests recognize them. We know that in the hiring process we seek out employees that we know will be dedicated to holding our standards high. We appreciate your business and hope to see you again.

Summary: Her name was Cathy. She was very nice and kind.  I really want to stay here again.  Just one thing was my room was little dark though, but it was OK. You guys have to ask to Cathy if you want to get a great service.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing Cathy to our attention. We have to agree, she is very special and we know how lucky we are to have her on our team. Please contact me with your name or room number so we can check it to see why it was dark.  Sally 714 484-2502  Thank you again for taking the time to write a comment in TripAdvisor!!

Summary: the front desk staff- silena, alicia and nicole are super helpful we always ask them to do extra stuff for our group and they always do it happily. we use the conference rooms for union negotiations and the front desk team always supports us in getting what we need But- the company should invest in some computers and xerox equipment from the 21st century because the the machines are very poor
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments about our front desk staff. We are very proud of the customer service we provide and Silena, Nicole, and Alicia are definitely stars!  I have shared your comments with them and I have also passed along your suggestions. Please note that we changed our computer systems in our Business Center and Boarding Pass stations during our renovation in October 2011 but it is important to us to see it from a guest's point of view.

Summary: Clean and big rooms, refrigerator, coffee maker. They have a Bistro in their beautiful lobby. The AC in our room did not have a cover on the controls so you can easily touch the microchip board thing. The actual controls are across the room on the wall and our AC took almost an hour to work so it was pretty warm in the room for a long while. Very close to Knott's Berry Farm that you can actually hear screams at the parking lot.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at our hotel. If you remember your room number, please let me know so we can check on the AC unit. You can also call me directly at 714 827-1010 and tell me your last name so we can check your room number in history and fix the problem.

Summary Heading: A MUST STAY!!! GREAT STAFF, SERVICE AND A BEAUTIFUL PLACE TO REST YOUR HEAD!
Summary: My family and I stayed for the weekend. We were immediately greeted as we approached the front desk by Silena. She was extremely friendly, professional and made us feel right home. Throughout our stay the staff was amazing as well. Our suite was PERFECT! During this trip we actually used some of the amentities that this hotel has to offer. We went down to the pool at night, the pool and jacuzzi were fabulous and the perfect temp. My husband and I also took advantage of the Fitness Center. We were very thrilled to see all state of the art equipment. We had breakfast with our family the following morning. The bistro staff were AWESOME.  The food was TOP NOTCH and the bistro even provides Starbucks which I love. Prices are very reasonable as well. I can't say enough about this
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments on our hotel. We definitely take great pride in our staff with Silena as our Front Office Manager, taking the lead and conducting training which you experienced first hand. Our new Bistro proudly serving Starbucks has been a hit with our guests and along with our 24 hour Market has surely served as a nice convenience. Again, your comments are greatly appreciated.

Summary: I just checked out of this hotel this morning and cannot rave enough about my stay. If I could give it more than five stars I would. As soon as I walked into the lobby I felt right at home. The design has a tranquil and contemporary setting. It felt very peaceful and zen like. Alicia at the front desk was professional and friendly. I called her twice to request a roll up bed and extra towels. Dave,I believe his name was, a tall older gentleman delivered them in a timely manner. A few minutes after he left Alicia called asking if we received the items we requested. Best staff. Thank you for making our stay an enjoyable one.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review in TripAdvisor for us.. We have recognized both Alicia and Dave for taking care of your needs. We enjoy hearing from our guests and hope you will be able to visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Friendliest Folks you could ever find!
Summary: I have stayed at this property twice now and simply can‚Äôt believe how nice the staff is.  If you have business in this area or if you want to visit Disney- stay at this hotel.  The staff at the Bistro is so warm and friendly and fun to talk to that you will actually WANT to spend your evening at the hotel. The front office staff is also very, very good.  The only complaint I have is that I asked if the hotel could shuttle me to Disney and was promised that someone will get back to me on that but no one did. Not a big deal. Overall, one of my best experiences at a Marriott.
Manager Response: What a wonderful review and thank you for your kind words about our Bistro and Front Desk Staff.  I am hoping you were able to join us on Thursday evening 3/21 for our Trivia Guest Appreciation Party! I apologize that you did not receive a call back about your shuttle to Disneyland question.The great news is that there is an OCTA bus that runs every 20 minutes down Katella to and from Disneyland for only $2.00!!! Thank you again for taking the time to review our hotel.

Summary: I recently stayed here for one night as my company has it's main office nearby.  I really enjoyed it.  First, the staff was very nice and accomodating and made you feel welcome.  Second, the bistro is very nice, has very good food, and the people again are very nice.  I ended up having dinner here the first night, breakfast and dinner again on the second day.  The hotel did endless favors for me - let me check out late, let me borrow a towel to go to the local 24 hour fitness club, and kept my luggage.  Lastly, the room was nice and the bed comfortable.  I highly recommend this proprerty.  Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and letting us know that we took good care of you. We are very proud of our well trained staff and this helps us to ensure that they are living up to our guests expectations!

Summary: I travel quite a bit for both business and pleasure. I should also say that I am a Marriott Rewards member. The Courtyard Cypress is quite simply the best. The customer service was extraordinary. Every time I entered I was greeted with a smile. The few needs I had were met and exceeded. This was true at all times during the day. Any time I am in LA, I will use this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel when you are in the area and thank you for the great comments. We appreciate your business!!

Summary Heading: This road warrior "likes" the Marriott Cypress
Summary: Southern CA can be a roll of the dice when it comes to hotels.  Some very chic, some good and basic and then some that are very scary.  So as I drove down Katella looking for the Courtyard I held my breath and truly hoped for a decent place - in a city I'd n e v e r visited and had no family, no less.  As it came into view, I may have actually.....smiled.  The lobby is so nice.  No, I mean really nice.  It houses the front desk area, the dining area and the lounge.  They have an upscale decor and nice real wood and design materials.  It's very spacious and the eating area does not infringe on the lounging area.  Plenty of space.  Even when it was full, the din of people talking was still comfortable.  The Courtyard has an oversized flatscreen just for people to use to do
Manager Response: What a wonderful review!! You are definitely hotel savvy and we are so glad that you pulled into ours. We are very proud of what we have to offer our guests and our service standards are always a main focus. If you plan on returning in the future there is actually a great steakhouse two miles down Katella- Madera's. Thank you again for taking the time to let us know how we are doing and allowing us to see a true picture from a guests' point of view.

Summary: On the way to the hotel from LAX we suddenly found the 405 completely closed.  I called the front desk and was given very good directions to get there on side streets.  She then greeted us when we finally got there and was all ready for us to check-in fast and get to bed.  The room was very nice and the beds very comfortable.  The night before we left I tried to print our boarding passes but the printer in the lobby wasn't working.  The young lady behind the desk took my flight info and printed out the boarding passes from her computer.  The little dining and bar area had good food, Starbucks coffee as well as real drinks.  We'll definately go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice comments. We are sorry for the inconvenience of the 405 freeway shutting down but glad to know you made it here with the assistance of our staff member, Christina. We appreciate your business and hope to see you back here soon.

Summary: Let me start by saying the hotel was very clean and updated. The style was definitely modern. The hotel staff was very good. However, I didn't like the room sizes. The pool definitely needs to be cleaned up and updated. And I was underwhelmed with how they handled breakfast for our large group. For the money it is okay but I wouldn't recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your comments. Because you traveled with a team, you might have been use to staying in a suite property with larger rooms. We do our best to accommodate families visiting us and work diligently to put them in one of our three room types that make the best fit. Unfortunately on these big tournaments weekends, it is a little more difficult because everyone is looking for the most spacious room available. Our pool is very well maintained however, at times on sports team weekends, it is very busy and sometimes difficult to keep up. Please contact me, I am interested in knowing what happened with your team breakfast. This is something that is generally very popular with our hotel.   714 827-1010. Thank you again for your comments.

Summary: The hotel was fine - clean, comfortable, quiet, with the expected amenities.  The outstanding thing for us was the staff.  They were attentive, helpful, friendly. Special kudos to Eduardo F. and housekeeping. I managed to leave my tablet in my room.  Housekeeping turned it in to the desk, and Eduardo called the next morning to let me know they had it.  As we live several states away, he FedEx'd it right away and I got it back in good condition.  Not every hotel staff would have been so honest and prompt in returning an expensive piece of gear like that.  Thanks, Eduardo!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We strive to make our guests feel at home and obviously we have succeeded with you. I am thinking you might have been here on our trivia night. We are getting ready to feature our new Spring Items in the Bistro that I am sure you will enjoy and yes, you are correct, there are quite a few restaurants within walking distance and quite a variety!! Thank you again.

Summary: The staff are all really pleasant and helpful. The Bistro is good but you quickly go through the menu. Fortunately there are lots of good places to eat locally. If there is a problem they do their best to sort it quickly. You have to get up early in the morning to get a machine in the gym. We had a quiz night which was great to meet the back room staff (including Sally). I stay here a lot and I always get a friendly greeting. When I get back after a days work it feels homely and welcoming. I enjoy coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response and for being such a loyal guest by traveling so far to stay with us! You are right, we have a nice Bistro as well as many local restaurants to choose from. You were here on our Trivia night which will be hosting again on the 21st. Hope to see you soon and safe travels.

Summary: I wanted to take a moment to express how grateful I am to the staff and management at this location. I stay at this same hotel every time I am in the LA area. However, this trip was a little unique because I rented a car that has apparently run out of gas once I arrived back to the hotel. Well, to make a long story short...I had about two hours to get across town and no gas in my rental car. The staff and on duty manager, Silena Munoz, went out of their way to located a gas can for me. The nearest gasoline was a few blocks away, but since I was pressed for time...Ms. Munoz drove me to the station to get gas! She saved the day...  It is because of people like Silena and her staff that customer service has a good name, when it comes to the name Marriott. I will continue to stay at
Manager Response: Thank you for writing your comments in TripAdvisor!   Our Front Office Manager, Silena is one of our many stars here at the hotel and she tends to go that extra mile for our guests to ensure their stay is comfortable and hassel free. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed at this particular Courtyard while waiting for our Carnival cruise out of Long Beach, and it was clean, quiet, and the front desk was particularly helpful. If you ask for a room facing east you can see the Disney fireworks without the hassle of Disney crowds. The only complaints was lack of a free (even continental) breakfast, and smallish rooms. Other than that, a nice stay on busy Katella Avenue.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments and hope you enjoyed your cruise!!

Summary: I visited the city and this hotel manages to find enough comfort, thanks to its excellent location close to all the sites and attractions. I thank all staff for their kindness at all times. Sure to visit again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We always appreciate our guests taking the time to send us feedback. Hopefully you will have the chance to visit us again and enjoy our new Bistro for Breakfast and Dinner where we also proudly serve Starbucks. Our lobby Go Board also points out several restaurants within walking distance from the hotel. Again, thank you for your wonderful comments!

Summary: When we first arrived the staff helped us get a suite and then let us good inspect the room to see if it would be suitable. Afterward they recommend that we take advantage of the weekend rate which we were not aware of.  Later that night when we returned to the hotel and they were out of a product that I wanted. The staff took the time to check in the storage and could not find the product. About 30 minutes later they came to my room and they had gone to a store a bought the product and brought it to me. I thought this is exemplary service.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to post your comments. Our staff takes great pride in going that extra mile for our guests. Hope to see you here again!!!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, no issues, fairly new property, clean, and well maintained
Summary: ‚Ä¢	I stayed at the Marriott Courtyard Cypress Anaheim/Orange County @ 5865 Katella Avenue, Cypress (CA) for one night on business ‚Ä¢	It appears to be a fairly new property, clean, and well maintained ‚Ä¢	Room was fine: overall good physical condition and comfortable bed ‚Ä¢	It has the updated Marriott Courtyard lobby with bristo restaurant and computer stations ‚Ä¢	There were no restaurants (other than the in-house) within walking distance ‚Ä¢	There are plenty of parking spaces (no charge) ‚Äì no issue ‚Ä¢	It is located in an office complex ‚Ä¢	Nice hotel, no issues, fairly new property, clean, and well maintained
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. Of course we prefer that our guests enjoy our Bistro however, we are within walking distance of several great restaurants as displayed on out lobby Go Board. Hopefully, you have the chance to return and stay longer and we will point them out to you. Again, thank you for taking the time to write us!

Summary Heading: A reasonable choice for the area
Summary: We stayed here for one night on a very cold weather day. Front desk was attentive. Room was very good. Breakfast was obviously not included. Missing equipment if you are looking for a suite equivalence. Fancy lobby not usefull, unless you are drinking in the bar. Conveient parking lot and WiFi service.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us taking the time to post a review. Our complimentary wireless and wired internet is available throughout the entire hotel. Hope you come back and visit us again soon!

Summary: no refrigerater in the room. no safe in the room.  upon arrival: the coffee pot had dredge of coffee still in it. makes you wonder what else wasn't cleaned, lobby is cold and uninviting. restaurant is in the middle of the lobby.back entrance is never locked. our room had a wet floor after the rain that was never dried out. nothing much in the immediate area for food, drink, or anything. we will never stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I apologize for the coffee pot incident and wet floor. We do supply a refirgerator at no charge upon arrival and we do have safe available at the front desk. We have our Bistro available for breakfast and dinner as well as a 24 hour market in our lobby with freshly made sandwiches, salads, fresh fruit, snacks,and much more.  We are within walking distance from an El Torito, Chilis, Red Robin, Fish Grille,  Sweetie Thai and several other restaurants including a Wendys and a Carls Jr. Hopefully you will try us again. Please feel free to contact me 714 827-1010

Summary: The staff was extremely nice and helpful.  One of my daughter's Leap Pad2 froze on our 8 hr. trip to Disneyland.  I was troubleshooting it their guest computer only to find out that I had to download the Leap Frog program.  With it being a public use computer, I was blocked from downloading it.  We were facing an 8-hr. car ride with a 2 and 4 yr. old and one had a working Leap Pad and the other didn't.  Needless to say, it was not going to be a fun ride home.  I told the night manager my dilemma, and he was gracious enough to allow me to use his office computer to fix it.  Thankfully, I was able to fix and have a pleasant drive home.  The night manager went over and beyond by allowing me to do this.  We greatly appreciate their above-and-beyond service they provided.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great comments and glad it all worked out well for you. I am sure you had a pleasant drive home with  that LeapFrog working.l!! Hope you are able to come back and visit us soon!

Summary: Stayed here in Dec 13. Good hotel within Orange County limits. Quiet place and easy access to many restaurants and services. Has access to internet via cable, need wi-fi. Only disappointment is the towels are thin. Has a Starbuck in lobby, but I didn't try. Easy access to/from 405.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Don't let the fancy lobby fool you!
Summary: Stayed here for a week for a business conference. If first impressions were all it took then this place would be great! Unfortunatly the lobby is the only positive this hotel has going for it! Worst mattress ever, shoddy bed linens, stained and worn out sofa. I tried to spend as little time as possible in the room. The corners had lint and dirt built up, the wallpaper was peeling. Won't be booking here again. No gold elite perks either :(
Manager Response: Thank you for your review as it only helps us to improve. We are scheduled for our room renovation in 2013 and hope you come back to visit us.

Summary: Stayed here in November when we went to Disneyland. The staff was very nice and helpfull. The rooms were clean and comfortable. Hint, ask for a room facing East and you will be able to see Disney's fireworks, they're only four mile away. They have some really good restaurants nearby and this hotel is in a good location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Our Bistro is a great addition to our hotel and the Courtyard brand and we are sorry you did not experience it. We apologize for your view of the HVAC on the second floor roof.  Unfortunately there are a few rooms in our entire hotel with that view and when we are sold out we need to utilize them. Thank you for staying with us..

Summary: Stayed here on business in July 2012.  Clean and comfortable, no complaints.  Hotel map showed a restaurant but there isn't one, I think they removed it.  There is a sort of bar/snack bar/kitchen place.  Other people ate their but it didn't look too promising to me, so I can't rate it.  My view was of the HVAC equipment on the roof.  I'd stay here again under the same circumstances, but it's not exactly a destination resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. You are correct, we did have a restaurant available for breakfast and dinner until our renovation, which was completed in September 2011.   What you  saw during your stay was our new Bistro with so many great choices. We also have our 24/7 market available with freshly made sandwiches, salads,and much more. These two options have been quite a hit with our guests along with our Starbucks!! Hopefully, you will come back and experience it.

Summary Heading: Horrible Experience with Party Noise in Room 229, Otherwise Reasonable
Summary: We were in Orange County for our daughter's softball tournament and assigned to room 229.  After getting up early for the long drive to So. Cal. and a full day of softball activities, we arrived back at the hotel at 9 pm exhausted and ready for a good night's sleep.  When we opened the doors to the room, the walls and floor were literally vibrating with booming sounds from a party.  We were told by the front desk that a Quinceanera Party below our room was responsible for the noise. They told us there were no other rooms they could assign us to.  However, they assured us that the party would end by 11 pm and that they would tell the band to tone it down.  However, by 11:35 pm the loud noise had not ended and was even intensifying.  The front counter personnel then revised the
Manager Response: Please accept our sincerest apology for the experience you had with the loud noise from the party that took place in our ballroom. Although it is located away from the rest of the hotel, it is situated under a few of our sleeping rooms. We try our best to book the rooms that are affiliated with the party in those rooms but for some reason you were booked into one of them.  I see the staff took care of you as far as compensation. Again, our apologies and thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Average is a little too high for this hotel but it isn't poor either
Summary: The lobby is nice enough but once up in our room the carpet (room 305) was bunched up in several places, I kept tripping on it, and the mattress was thin and hard as a rock.   This hotel feels like a budget motel.  The bathroom is small and there was only shampoo and conditioner (no lotion) as well as two bars of soap.   The "suite" was just a large room - definitely nothing special.  The cushion on the sofa (sleeper sofa) was only about 4 inches thick - very thin.  I can only imagine how uncomfortable the sleeper would be.  This is the second Marriott property I've stayed in in two weeks and I've come to realize how disappointing these hotels are.   Although we got a super deal of $79 for the room I wouldn't have paid more for it.      I do not recommend staying here
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We understand that you had issues with your room and we have adressed them with our maintenance division. We are scheduled for the renovation of all of our sleeping rooms and hope that you will revisit us and see what we have done to make this hotel top notch!

Summary: The first room we were given had a sloping bed - an inch and a half higher on the right than the left.  We requested and were given another room.   In the second room, here were two light bulbs out, which they promptly replaced.  The shower faucet was hard to turn on, and even harder to turn off - leaving a small stream running in the tub, which I reported.  Next evening, same problem with the faucet - difficult to turn on, and left a stream running when I tried to turn it off.    The sofa bed couch looked old - cushions soiled and smushed down.    AC in the room worked ok, but the halls are uncomfortably warm; I guess they are saving money on energy.   They say they have complimentary coffee, but I spent three nights there, and never was able to get any coffee that I didn't pay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We really appreciate you bringing this to our attention as we are always looking for ways to provide the best possible experience for our guests. We hope to see you in the future and earn that perfect score!

Summary: The hotel overall is in good shape. It's in a good location with easy access to freeways and orange county attractions. There's a Mexican restaurant next door and fast food about a half mile away. The king bed suite was clean and big enough to accommodate four people. Not the best, but very good for the price.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to write a review about our hotel in TripAdvisor. It sounds as though you enjoyed your stay and ventured out to see what we have available to our guests nearby. We try to keep rates affordable to families traveling to Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm and other attractions. We hope you are able to visit us again soon

Summary Heading: Safe and Secure, Clean, Friendly Service, Good Location, Affordable
Summary: Southern California is sometimes hit and miss regarding safe areas.  Cypress is clean, well-lit, and free of uncomfortable traffic.  Parking was free and ample.  Check-in and check-out was efficient and friendly.  The rooms are set up for business travel (large desk and free wifi), but are comfortable for a family traveling to Disneyland.  Rooms with king-sized bed and double bed pull-out couch is perfect for a family of four on vacation.  Easy travel from Long Beach Airport (much more efficient than LAX and often less expensive).  Easy travel to Disneyland or other attractions, including relatively easy travel to beaches.  Drawbacks:  no refrigerator or microwave, so not great for bringing your own foods.  No complimentary breakfast.  However there are ample nearby restaurant
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful comments. You have pointed out quite a few of our many great features and you are defintely thorough and observant. Please know that we do have 24 suites in our hotel equipped with microwaves and small refrigerators and we also have several small refrigerators available on a first come first serve basis, complimentary to our guests.  We do not offer complimentary breakfast but what we do provide is a fabulous new Bistro with many choices as well as a 24 hour Market stocked with an array of food, beverages and sundries as well. We appreciate your business and hope to see you back again soon! Again, thank you!!

Summary: Walked in and the lobby was absoltely beautiful. It offered great amenities for business and leisure travelers. Looked newly remodeled and VERY clean. Excited to see how the rooms would be an disappointed by the trips early end. Walked into the room, smelled very dingy like a wet towel that hadn't been dried or washed for a while, but tolerable. First night our son slept in his playpen with no problems.  He enjoyed the pull out bed at naptime and watch his movies on our portable DVD player there so we let him sleep there the second night. Needless to say that was a huge mistake. He woke up saying "Owie Mommie" while scratching his abdomen.  I lifted his shirt and found little bites all over his litte stomach and a couple on his back. We decided we'd just put him back in his
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing your experience to our attention. We immediately placed on an "Out Of Order" status on the room until we were able have an outside specialist come in and conduct a thorough inspection.  Please know that we are extremely sorry that your son had experienced this and hope he recovered quickly. We have received a letter certified by the company  we hired and will be more than willing to supply to you with a copy stating that there were no signs of bedbugs in the room, including the beds and sofa sleeper.  We do apologize that you had a delay in response to your reversal of charges but when booking through a third party it has to be taken care of on their end as well.

Summary: The hotel was great! Very nice clean hotel and the staff was very polite. There isn't much around if your not there for work, but I would def stay again. Really enjoyed our time. The only bad thing I can say is that I wish that they had a continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a great review of your stay with us. Although it is true that we are located in a nice quiet corporate area, if you have the opportunity to wander out we have a lot of great things available.   Our electronic GoBoard located in our lobby lists many restaurants, shopping centers, Knott's Berry Farm, Disneyland and much more all within seven miles with public bus transportation leaving every 20 minutes just outside the hotel as well as quick reliable taxi service.  We hope to see you back soon and again, thank you so much for your review.

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights on business because the location was perfect for me.   The lobby is nice enough, and the free breakfast area has been replaced by a "bistro" styled short order restaurant.  I had cereal and fruit; prices are reasonable.   The room, a king, was musty and the air conditioning did not work well.   My room faced the afternoon sun, and so never really cooled down until after dark.   I'd go to bed hot and wake up cold.   Bed was very comfortable.  Free wifi is a good thing, and the TV was nice, but the channels are limited and there's no guide channel or option; you have to use a little paper guide.  Used the fitness center twice, and it's nice/good/small.  Staff was efficient, friendly, really excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments, we appreciate learning what our guests experience during their stay with us. Our new Bistro, serving fresh, higher quality and healthy options have been a huge plus.  Our guests do appreciate our complimentary WiFi and new flatscreen TV's. I am sorry the channel guide did not work well for you and I will discuss this with our provider and management team on a way of improving this. We are also in the process of purchasing the few new air conditioners to replace the ones that are not working up to par.   Thank you for choosing the Courtyard Cypress, your business is appreciated.

Summary: Always enjoy staying here. The staff are always courteous and very prompt in meeting any needs I may have. The new lobby and breakfast area look nice, and add a new, modern feature to the property. I thought the idea of a breakfast bar, and omlette station was an outstanding idea!! The rooms are fine, not great but they sreve the purpose just fine. The location is perfect for my needs, and I would not hesitate to recommend this location to any of my colleagues.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are very proud of our staff. Most of them have been with us for a very long time and take great pride in their postions. We appreciate your business and hope you are planning to return soon!!

Summary: Great staff that's always attentive & polite. Whenever I return to stay in Orange County, I prefer to stay here because I know what I'm going to get. Close to various restaurants in the area as well. New lobby is nice, like the cafe bar, brekafast buffett was very, very good and the rooms are fair and in need of being remodeled.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review in TripAdvisor. Your comments are appreciated. You had stayed here during a special time that we had set up a special Breakfast Buffet and so glad you enjoyed it.  Our new Bistro serving Breakfast and Dinner are also a big hit! I am pleased to tell you that we are scheduling a time for a room renovation but no set date as of yet. Thank you again and hope you return soon.

Summary Heading: Great stay only one mishap but was handle well and fast by staff
Summary: Overall fantastic stay wouldnt hesitate too stay again. Enjoyed staff and service. Location was fantastic. Breakfast was awesome. also like the new upgrades and remodeled lobby. Have a problem with my room and the staff handled it fast With no problems. room was clean daily
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great review and for selecting the Courtyard Cypress!! We appreciate your business.

Summary Heading: The next best thing to family!
Summary: As a frequent traveler, I stay in many locations throughout the U.S. and its territories.  In all my travels, no other hotel makes me feel as welcome as the Courtyard in Cypress, CA.  Without exception the entire staff from the moment of check in with Emily, Kenny and others, to breakfast with Sylvia, the Cypress Courtyard has the best service.    The rooms are always clean, comfortable and well maintained which is always nice for a good night's rest when traveling for business.    Relaxing after work hours in the lounge, it is always an enjoyment to see and be served by Francia or Janice.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your remarks which I have shared with our staff. We take great pride on the fact that our management team and staff  have been onboard with us for many years and we do appreciate our guests.

Summary: I have had my share of hotels over the last three years and the Marriott Cypress is by far heads above the other hotels in Southern California. Great and friendly staff, above average rooms (clean and bed comfortable) and food choice is good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel. I have shared your comments with our management team who will in turn, pass them on to our staff. I do recognize your name and thank you for staying with us,

Summary: Poor AC, mediocre breakfast (lack of selection) but decent price.  I'd check around first.  If it weren't that my employer set up the stay I would not be coming back.  However, the staff is excellent, especially the desk staff.  I feel that they almost make up for the rest.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We really appreciate you bringing this to our attention as we are always looking for ways to provide the best possible experience for our guests. We hope to see you in the future and earn that perfect score!

Summary: We stayed here for a family trip to the area, Disneyland, Baseball games, Universal Studios, and Huntington Beach.  The room was older (sparkle ceilings and very low in bathroom) I would say OK as far as clean goes. But the beds were comfortable, and staff was great. Close to all the attractions we were visiting and for the price the room was I am sure more comfortable and possibly nicer than those "busier" hotels closer to Disney.  Although you don't get a free breakfast  here like most of those. But WiFi and parking are free and we felt safe here at all times. We could be a little spoiled and liking newer hotels, but as I said for the price it wasn't bad I would call it average to good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Your comments are very valuable to us. We had just completed out major Lobby and Meeting Room renovation late last year. We understand it is time to complete the renovation!! We hope you can return to experience the changes 2013..

Summary: I have had the pleasure of staying at this hotel several times over the past 2 months for business.  The experience has been excellent.  The strongest feature of this hotel are the fanatastic staff.    The people at this facility are very caring, make you feel at home and always respond quickly to any requests.  The lobby is recently remodeled in the Courtyard fashion, but the larger floor space make this much more comfortable.  The rooms I have had are comfortable and the beds provide an excellent nights sleep. For a hotel, the food is excellent.  So much so that I have had people comment on it to me in the elevator. Overall, a very enjoyable experience and I have been traveling on busines for 32 years.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review  for us. We always look forward to hearing from our guests. We hope you are able to visit us again soon.

Summary: Spent 4 nights in this dump. I can testify that the smell another reviewer spoke about is real. Stayed in Room 315 and the place is very musty.   Noticed a spider crawling around on my pillow the first night, which prompted me to look up at the fire sprinkler on the wall above the bed. It clearly hasn't been cleaned in many years! I know these are sensitive devices, but come on! You can at least run a duster over it once every year or so.  Tried to place an out-going call, inadvertently dialed an incorrect number, so hung up and tried again. Phone had a busy signal....  I thought that was odd, so I waited a few minutes, but still busy. Unplugged the phone (which looks and smells like it came form 1970, by the way) but still got the busy signal. Since I was unable to dial the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review . We welcome all constructive criticism, as it helps us to get better.  I wanted to share with you what we have have done to address your issues.  We were in the process of having all of our room carpets cleaned which is what caused the musty smell.  We went back into your room and rewashed the carpet and dried it properly this time.  In addition, we have fixed the telephone and replaced the coffee maker.  Our Management team has discussed the towel situation with our housekeeping department which should resolve that issue also.  Again, please accept our apologies.

Summary: I can't say enough about Gary Liss and Justin (didn't get his last name). I was in town and ran into a situation, I went to the Hotel and they went over and beyound for me and my daughter! They were so kind and understanding and gave me a great rate for the night! Justin did what he could and helped us in a time of need. Gary all I can say is "wow" he made us feel at home, he knew we were leaving for Universal Studio's the next morning and he gave us fruit to take with us. He came around and said hello in the morning while we were eating breakfest and ask us how our stay was and if we needed anything else to let him know. I was 5 hours away from home and they both made me feel like we were apart of their family. I have told everyone this story and my daughter wants to go back
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review. Gary Liss is our General Manager and Justin Parga is our Front Desk Supervisor. They do go out of their way to ensure that our guests have a comfortable stay. We do hope to see you and your daughter here again in the future!

Summary Heading: Not what I expected from a Marriott Property...
Summary: I'm not one to complain... but seeing as I work in the hospitality industry I thought sharing my experience would help travelers. The first problem we experience was the smell... very musty similar to old water in our room... then we found a semi patched water leak over the sofa on the ceiling with the wall paper peeling off... Our top sheet had a stain on it so we pulled it off and went for the extra fleece blanket in our "bed in a bag" found in the closet... before I could even unzip the bag I noticed a big long black hair on it, so we went down to the front desk and requested a new blanket be sent up and let the front desk supervisor know what we had found... she apologized for the yucky inconvenience.... when the new blanket was sent up we had unfolded it to find even MORE
Manager Response: Please accept my apology for what you experienced at our hotel last week. I am very concerned about the condition of your room amd would like the opportunity tomake sure the problems have been addressed.  This is definitely not a normal circumstance at our hotel and unfortunately, because these comments are anonymous, I am unable to track this without  a room number. Please contact me at your convenience. Thank you - Sally Brayton 714 827-1010.

Summary Heading: Good for business travel considering all other options near by
Summary: Room of very good size, MANY electric outlets everywhere, particularly nice the ones on the lamps near the bed! Very clean, comfortable bed and fast check in and checkout. Internet is free and has good speed.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a nice review of our hotel. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your business!!

Summary: This location is well situated within close proximity of restaurants and shopping.  It's nicely decorated and is the usual Marriott Courtyard quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel with a nice exercise room
Summary: This hotel was recently renovated.  The rooms are nice and the exercise room is one of the nicer ones I have been in.  It is near all the local businesses so is especially well located if travelling for work.  The one downside is that the AC is still the old style wall units with the crappy dial thermostat.  Hard to keep the room at a good temperature with those
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. I apologize for the problem you experienced with the air conditioner in your room.  As in most hotels that is standard and I understand your concern. Please contact me on you next visit. We do have rooms that have the newer type units and I will be more than happy to upgrade you. Sally Brayton

Summary: Everything about our room was nice.  The hotel staff was nice. I had asked for extra pillows before arriving and they weren't in the room when we arrived. We had to ask twice to have them sent up to our room.  Our room faced the parking lot, no view though obscured by a wall which was okay. And our room was very close to the elevators.  Breakfast is $10.00 per person.  Not sure if the food was good or not we didn't partake. I wish though they had a complimentary continental breakfast. They do have complimentary coffee served from 6 AM to 10 AM which is nice. The hotel is very close to Knottsberry Farm and Disneyland which is great but a bit of a distance to drive to other restaurants.  There is an El Torrito right around the corner from the hotel, walking distance.  The service
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review and letting us know your concerns, We are excited about our new Bistro featuring a more higher quality, healthier, made to order menu for both lunch and dinner. We offer a wide range of breakfast items, featuring fresh fruit, yogurts, oatmeal,smoothies, muffins, bagels all the way up to breakfast sandwiches and eggs to order. The prices of course vary and the highest item on  the breakfast menu is $9.95. This new concept has been very popular with our guests and now featuring a Starbuck's has made it even more alluring. We are slated to have a room renovation and I am so sorry you experienced a problem with the mattress. I do hope you come back to visit us again and give us another chance.

Summary: Have stayed there for over 18 months. Fabulous staff, Nice value, Clean rooms.  Addison, Justin, Rutha, Kenny, Emily, Gary, the list goes on, and on, are just fantastic.  If you truely want to enjoy your trip, this is the place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great review of our hotel and thank you for staying with us, we appreciate your business!!!

Summary: This is the first time I have felt the need to write a review about a hotel, however, after spending almost 3 times the amount of money at a competing hotel within the same area, I want to take the time to share how impressed I was with this hotel and its customer service!  This location is perfect if you have a rental car.  It was located near Disneyland, several beaches, and many other attractions.  It is not somewhere you want to be if you have to walk, but with a rental car, it is a central location that always has available parking.  A nice outside pool, is quiet and the rooms are clean.  The staff was very helpful and the rate was perfect!  Thank you Courtyard for a wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Dear Rachelle- thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review in TripAdvisor! This is a great location - close enough to Disneyland, Knotts Berry Farm and other attractions and yet out of the traffic and hustle and bustle.  We do have several restaurants and fast food establishments within walking distance for those who do not have a car. Besides El Torito two doors down we have a Red Robin as well as around the corner on Valley View there is a Chili's, Fresh Fish Restaurant, Thai, Japanese, Wendy's and Carl's Jr.  Of course you have many more options having a car and we have complimentary parking!! Again, thank you!!

Summary: Besides being a comfortably decorated and clean hotel the staff of this hotel has been the most accommadating I have run into lately. I left my wallet with ID and credit cards on Friday in our room and after talking with Alison Novy I had my wallet in the mail on Monday. She understood my panic and took immediate action. All of the staff we have incounter have been wonderful. Not only do I like being in a hotel that I am confident is clean I truly like being treated as an important guest.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for bringing your experience to our attention. Allison Novy has been with us for four years and has proven to be a great asset to our hotel. We take great pride in the fact that our lost and found system is a very secure and organized department.  We are extremely grateful that you did not have to go through the nightmare of replacing your cards and documents. We hope to see you again soon and thank you for staying with us!.

Summary: My daughter and I stayed at the Courtyard by Marriott Cypress for two nights when we were visiting Disneyland.  The beds were very comfortable (we stayed in the double/double) and had four pillows each.  The shower was good with strong water pressure.  The entire hotel is non-smoking, which is a definite plus.  There is also free parking, which is kind of a rarity anywhere around Disney now.  It took about 15 - 20 minutes to get to Disneyland. The only way I could think of to improve the hotel would be to have a mini-fridge.  We didn't use any of the amenities since we were at the parks all day and in to the night.  We got a very good rate of $79/night several months ago on Kayak.  I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. You are so right- we are the best kept secret for people traveling this way  to go to Disneyland.
