We are located on Katella Avenue, same as Disneyland- just a straight seven mile drive and you are there. No traffic, complimentary high speed internet, parking and great rates! As far as our shower heads, we have guests who ask if they can purchase them!! The beds are wonderful too- with your choice of pillows!! Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The hotel had friendly employees, clean rooms & a quiet location. It is close to Disney, good restaurants, Target & beaches. Free parking and comfy beds.The only thing the double full size room could have used was a mini-fridge. This is my first choice in the Huntington Beach/Anaheim/Long Beach area due to the value.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Our management team appreciates your feedback. Please know that we do have mini-refrigerators available at no cost extra cost. I am not sure if you had asked for one or not. but if you stay with us again, please ask and our housekeeping department will deliver one to your room. We appreciate your business, thank you for staying with us and hope to see you out this way again..

Summary Heading: Good for a night's stay over a weekend
Summary: I stayed just one night while visiting family over a weekend at a low rate.  The room was clean and a good size.  The bed was comfortable.  The newly renovated lobby is attractive and practical.  The only complaint I have is the air conditioning is quite noisy.  This is an old structure and I'm not sure how Marriott would change this for the whole building.  Overall, for the price paid and close location to family, I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review in TripAdvisor We appreciate your feedback and your business. Please contact me directly next time you are coming out this way- I will make sure you have a complimentary mini- fridge in your room!!

Summary: My husband and I booked a room at this hotel because it was close to where his sister was staying (she flew out from Tennessee) and we have had good experiences with Marriott before.  #1, when we arrived we found out that a youth basketball team and soccer team were staying there....not that we mind kids, but I couldn't use the jacuzzi or pool because it was very 'crazy' there!  #2, the walls are paper thin....we heard people taking showers at 11:30 pm and could hear every door being opened and toilet being flushed..... :-(  The people who worked there were great, it was just the property.  We decided to cut our trip short because of this stay...
Manager Response: Dear Jamie, thank you so much for taking the time to write a review to let us know about your stay. Please accept our apologies for your experience you encountered. Being a corporate hotel, the weekend your sister stayed was definitely not the norm. There was a city-wide tournament in the area and because the handful of hotel options in Cypress, we all take these teams in on a limited amount of weekends thoughout the year.   We try to make sure that the travelers not involved in these team weekends are aware beforehand. Obviously this was not the case with you and your family. Again, please accept our apologies and let us know the next time your sister visits from Tennesee and we will be delighted to take care of her hotel stay. Kindest Regards, Sally Brayton

Summary: I was there visiting some family this past week and the management there is pathetic. My family had a problem with the ac, so my dad went to the front desk and spoke with denise the front office manager. My father was trying to explain what was wrong with the ac and how it leaked all over the floor, but he only got a few words out before she started interrupting him. She was saying that this sort of thing happens all the time and someone would be up there to fix it. My dad said thank you and she replied "you welcome". I have no idea what it takes to be in management at the marriott but my guess is that it does not take a lot. When we returned to the room the carpet was still wet, so i called the front desk and spoke with justin and told him what happened and he apologized and
Manager Response: Dear John, Thank you for your review and making us aware of the issues you experienced while staying at our hotel. We apologize for the problem you encountered with the AC unit in your room during your stay and that it ws not taken care of in a timely manner. We have addressed your issues with our Manager, Denise. The good news is we are replacing these AC Units at this time and this problem should be resolved. Thank you for staying with us and we do hope that you will give us another chance. Please contact me personally and I will take care of your next stay.- Kindest Regards, Sally Brayton

Summary: There are 3 basic requirements for the hotel to be considered average: Clean, comfortable, quiet.  The room was clean and spacious.  The bed was very comfortable.  Quiet...just as I was about to fall asleep I heard what I thought was a room service cart going a hundred miles an hour down the hallway.  Turns out that was not the cause of the racket.  It was someone taking a shower in the room next door, or above, I couldn't tell.  But the noise was horrendous.  I am not a light sleeper, so I was soon dozing away, but that was noisy!  The rest of the stay was very satisfying, nice staff, pretty lobby and bar, quick meals at the little cafe.  Too bad about the plumbing sound.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing the problem you encountered during your stay to our attention. We strive to make sure our guests are comfortable. We are working on the issue you experienced with the loud pipes. Our Chief Engineer explained that once in a whole, but not often the booster pumps affect the water pressure and it can result in a specific pipe being noisy for a short period of time.  We are working on adjusting this where needed and thank you again for bringing this to our attention.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel in need of employee training
Summary: I recently spent five nights at this hotel.  All staff during the weekdays were top notch and provided excellent service.   The weekend staff needs some additional training.   I reported a problem with my room Heat / AC unit to the weekend desk clerk.  I could not get the temperature of my room regulated.  I woke up two nights in a row in a cold room. The heat was set to 69 degrees.  The second night there was a puddle of water in my room by the unit.  I reported it to the desk clerk when I left for the day.   The clerk seemed indifferent, by Marriott standards, and said some one would fix it.   When I returned that evening there no no indication anyone had looked at the unit.   I decided to wake up hot rather than cold, so I turned the heat to 74 degrees.  This facility has a
Manager Response: Dear Cliff, Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. It only helps us to see where we can improve and let our staff know what our guests are experiencing. We take great pride in the fact that the majority of our staff have been with us for many years and are well trained. As true in many cases, seniority sets in and the newer staff members work the weekend. Nevertheless, this is no excuse for not having the ability to serve our guests just as professionally as our staff with more experience. Please know that we are working on bringing all of our team up to the high standards that our guests have come to expect over the years. As for your cold sandwich in the Bistro, apologies again. Our Bistro is the new Courtyard standard and we just completed a major renovation in our lobby, adding this wonderful addition, unfortunately, you were here when we were just completing training. Hopefully you will come back to see how we can "Wow" you! Kindest Regards, Sally Brayton

Summary: I wish all of our stays were like this. Stayed for two nights. The guy at the front desk was having a little trouble getting us checked in; said it was his first day. He was very nice nonetheless and apologetic. Gave us little gift bags for our trouble. Room was spacious, quiet, clean and very comfortable. No complaints.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Spent 3 nights at this hotel in December of 2011. Overall had a great stay.  This is a great 3 star hotel. If you're looking for a 5 star hotel, this is not it. however if you want a decent clean place to stay with great service, this is it..  The hotel has very friendly staff that went out of their way to assist us.   The rooms are good with comfortable beds and all of the basic amenities you would expect.  Overall, would stay here again if I was in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I had originally made a reservation for 5-days here and I just got the basic 1-bed studio with a sofa bed and it just ended up being too small for us (2 adults and 1 child).  The sofa bed was beyond uncomfortble and there wasn't any other rooms available so we just checked out after 1-night.  We did have the Continental Breakfast and that was pretty small but good.  The service was nice but the location wasn't very good to where we wanted to be by Disney anway so it just didn't turn out to the hotel for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We really appreciate you bringing this to our attention as we are always looking for ways to provide the best possible experience for our guests. We hope to see you in the future and earn that perfect score!

Summary: I stayed here for a business trip and while the rooms were sufficiently clean, the management here seems really unprofessional.  The people at the front desk were very helpful and nice and suggested some good places for dinner.  During my stay here, I overheard the manager yelling at her employees in front of me when I was coming back in from dinner.  I found this extremely unprofessional for a manager to be yelling at her employees in public in front of customers walking by.  Not only to talk to her employees that way, but to also be doing that in front of customers during a business stay?  Completely unacceptable which will make me not want to stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We really appreciate you bringing this to our attention as we are always looking for ways to provide the best possible experience for our guests. We hope to see you in the future and earn that perfect score!

Summary Heading: Great Property for a nice Stay
Summary: I visit this Hotel whenever I go to the LA area on Business and I have been pleased with this Hotel everytime. They have re-modelled the hotel this year (2011) and the looby looks really good. The service is always friendly and the breakfast options are also good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Great stay and good group salesperson
Summary: Our group stayed here during a conference. The rooms were nice and clean. The parking is good and location is convenient to numerous places.  They offer at their restaurant is open and offered a variety of breakfast items at a reasonable price. Several were even healthy!!  The group salesperson was very helpful and provided great service.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I had the opportunity to stay here for two nights earlier this week and had an excellent stay. I am on the road more than 150 days a year and am glad I had the chance to stop by this property. The new lobby looks great and still smells new! The rooms are not brand new (yet), but they are very clean, well lit, spacious, and have a lot of easily accessible electrical outlets. The sink is located outside of the bathroom so it is easy to get ready while somebody is in the shower.   I had no problems during my stay and very much enjoyed the friendly service from the front desk and the rest of the staff. The only thing I would change is the mattress I had in my room. It was very comfortable but it felt like it was somewhat older. This was overall not an issue and I still thought that
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful, clean, comfortable hotel and I would stay there again.
Summary: I spent one night here because it was close to my daughter and her family.  They were getting their home ready to sell so I wanted to help them pack, etc.  There was no room for me to stay there so I decided to spend the night at this Courtyard.  The room was very clean and nicely decorated.  The bed was pretty comfortable but then I sleep on a Tempurpedic mattress at home and nothing compares to that!  The hotel is close to restaurants and other businesses and also not too far from Knott's Berry Farm and various other Orange County attractions.  The only downside was they don't provide a small refrigerator or microwave in the rooms, which I would have preferred.  The front desk hotel clerk was friendly and quickly checked me in.  I really have no complaints and recommend this
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to send in a review about your stay here at the Courtyard. We are looking forward to our new transition to the Courtyard Refreshing Business in just a matter of two more weeks! I am hoping you will be back to stay with us again and if so, please ask to have a small refrigerator sent up to your room. We do have them available at no charge.  Again, thank you !

Summary Heading: Renovation ruined my stay, front desk not friendly
Summary: I feel so disappointed with how much money I spent at this hotel for my birthday vacation. The lobby is closed, the restaurant is closed, and there is a makeshift bar at the pool...not quite the ambiance I hoped for. The courtesy continental breakfast doesn't even come close to compensating for not having the convenience of a restaurant and a relaxing lounge to enjoy a cocktail. I asked for a king sized bed at check-in (and I totally understand those can't be guaranteed) but the reply from the front desk was so cold and abrupt: 'we're sold out'. No apology, no warm welcome, no indication that I was valued as a customer at all. After reading such great reviews about the staff here, I was surprised at the obvious lack of hospitality during my entire trip. Of all the times I've
Manager Response: Thank you for your taking the time to share your issues with us. We apologize for the experience you endured on your special birthday vacation. We did our best to notify all guests with prior reservations about our renovation. I am not sure if you had made your reservation in advance to receive these. Courtyards are not known to have restaurants and a lounge prior to the new Lobby concept we are about to have. We did have a cafe available for breakfast (not complimentary). We are offering a continental breakfast to all of our guests to show our appreciation for staying with us during this time. We do have a variety of restaurants in our area and within walking distance including one that delivers room service for lunch and dinner. They are just two doors down and have one of the best lounges in the entire area. I am sorry that you were not greeted by our staff. This is highly unusual for us and there is no excuse. Please contact me so that we can discuss how we can assist you. Thank You

Summary Heading: Great time with a soccer team!
Summary: We had a large group for a soccer tournament, and the Cypress Marriott really came through with a great price, good service, and an overall good time.  Cherie was wonderful to work with.  I was supposed to have a King suite, but when I checked in, they had me listed with 2 connected rooms.  Apparently, there was a problem with my room, so they upgraded me to 2 rooms for the same price which was wonderful because it gave the players more room to hang out, and some of the players didn't have to share beds.  I will use this hotel when we go back next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing your soccer team to us and your great review of our hotel. Cherie is very well known in the Cypress area after so many years of being with us and has earned the reputation for going all out to make sure her teams are comfortable during their stay. We hope to see you again soon!!.

Summary Heading: The Cypress Mrriott has NEVER let me down
Summary: I chose to have my wedding reception with the Marriott in Cypress because I absolutely knew that we (including my WHOLE family) would be well taken care of. I have stayed at this hotel only a handfull of times, but each time I do, I have always had a most wonderful stay. For a bride, a wedding can be a bit stressful, but as soon as I stepped in those doors, I was welcomed with open arms and given a sence of "don't worry, we will take care of you". On such a special occasion, the staff helped me with every little request I had, and I trully felt calm so that I was able to enjoy every moment. I stayed for two nights including my wedding night. My suite was emaculate, very clean. My bed was super comfortable. I had everything I needed including a personal phone call from the Gary
Manager Response: Congratulations and many many years of happiness! Thank you for choosing us for your wedding and for all the great compliments. We strive to ensure that our brides are stree-free on their special day. Our Banquet Captain, Humberto has been here over 10 years, our Chef has been here over 13 years Sandie, our Catering Director has been with our company for 7 years and our General Manager, Gary Liss for over 9 years, so we are always confident that these special occasions will go well. There is a lot to be said for our staff mainly because they truly care about every event. Again, thank you for your kind words and keep in mind we are here for your anniversary parties!!!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay and very accomodating
Summary: This is the second time I have stayed here with a large group.  Both times they have been very easy to work with and have done everything they could to make our stay great. The rooms are nice and comfortable and a good thing is the halls are built to keep the rooms quiet inside.  They know how to work with groups and really help setting up everything you need.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We take great pride in the fact that our entire Management Team has been here for more than six years. We definitely understand the needs of our guests and work diligently to ensure that our staff is well-trained. Thank you again for your kind words and glad you enjoyed your time here in Southern California!!

Summary: Only complaint is the ultra loud room air conditioner - not too unusual but never a favorite. Nice appearance and furnishings, good wi-fi, comfortable room.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your comments in Trip Advisor. We appreciate your business and hope you are considering future stays with us in the future. I understand that the humming noise from hotel air conditioners can be a nuisance. I experience the same issue when I travel. Again, thank you for staying with us and taking the time to post your comments.

Summary: The hotel staff were very helpful when I requested a refrigerator.  It was in my room within minutes.  They were also very friendly and always greeted upon leaving and arrival.  The location was very central to where I needed to be during my stay.  All around, it was a terrific stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We take great pride in our service and spend a lot of time ensuring that our staff is well trained and upholds the Marriott standards. Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again on your next trip to the Cypress area!

Summary: Our company has stayed at this Courtyard by Marriott often, and will continue to do so whenever we are in town. The rooms are comfortable and clean, the staff very helpful, and it's in a great location, near the restaurants and stores. Though it's pretty close to the freeway, the hotel is quiet and the comment we hear most often is how restful everyone feels after a night there, very important when one has a convention or a string of long meetings the next day! They also have a good breakfast buffet that opens early, with a chef in one corner if you want your breakfast specially prepared, and a well-stocked convenience store area. Overall the vibe here is very friendly and we have always felt at home here. I heartily recommend this hotel to everyone!
Manager Response: Dear Fran, Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review for us in Trip Advisor. Our guests comments are extremely important to us. Although we are located on  well traveled Katella, you are right, the noise does play havoc on us the way the hotel is situated. Again, thank you for ypur kind comments and choosing Courtyard by Marriott. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!!

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel numerous times and have been very happy each time with the comfort, cleanliness, affordable, and friendly with professional staff!  I would like to highly recommend this hotel to anyone going to that area which is close to restaurants and shops.
Manager Response: Dear Ms Benudiz,  Thank you for your comments. The staff and management will continue to work hard to see that our guests enjoy their stay. Please contact me on your next visit, I would like the opportunity to meet you.   Kindest Regards,  Sally Brayton

Summary: I have to say, "Courtyard by Marriot in Cypress, CA is the best." I am a single woman and only stay in hotels that are clean, safe, and that care about their customers. Every year since 2003, I have chosen to stay at this hotel and at least four times a year sometimes more. I stay for one to three nights, and In eight years I've never had a bad experience there. I have had special Sorority events at this hotel that were wonderful. Most importantly, the rooms are ALWAYS clean and professionally made up. I've stayed here so often it almost feels like home to me, and I've recommended it to more people than I can count. The empolyees are always friendly, helpful and eager to please...they have become like family to me after so many years.  Seriously, the only time I would ever stay
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I stayed one night for a business trip.  There was an event there so my association have everyone stayed there, this is our first time.  I took a shower before I went to bed, there were no bites.  when I was laying on the bed, I smelled some weird smell on the pillow , I thought it was just a dirty pillow so I threw the pillow on the side and not use it.  The next morning I saw a bug bite on my abdomen area.  I had to check out at 5:30 AM and went to my association conference.  I told the people there that it might be a bug bite.  When I got home, I went to the shower and noticed 15 bites on my abdomen area.  I got out of the shower and called the hotel to notify them of this problem.  The lady there says that the manager will not be able to call me back until Monday (3 days
Manager Response: We want to apologize to you for your troubles here at the Courtyard Cypress and want to let you know that we have hired a professional exterminating company to inspect and confirm that we do not have bed bug infestation in this room or this hotel.  We have  left you a voice mail apologizing and asking that either you contact our GM or he will continue to attempt to contact you so that we can fully explore what may have happened and get to the bottom of this issue and make you happy.

Summary: When I first checked in, I had a room that had a wet towel draped over the fire alarm system in the room. I asked for another room, and received a room on the same floor. The fire alarm went off in the early morning hours. I have stayed there one time before, and the fire alarms also went off then. When I took my shoes off in the room, a bunch of trail mix was stuck on the soles of my feet. The shower head was pointed to the middle of the room.  When I turned on the shower, it ran all over the bathroom. when I checked out I received the receipt of another guest.
Manager Response: We apologize for your difficulties at our hotel and regret the inconvenience that we caused you.  If you would be so kind as to contact our hotel our General Manager would love to speak with you and see what we can do to make this right.

Summary Heading: Really nice hotel for business and pleasure.
Summary: The hotel was clean and the rooms are large. We had a king size bed that was comfortable and in good condition. The pool area is kept nicely. We used the conference room, which was nice and the hotel staff set everything up to our liking. Nice hotel that I would stay at anytime the opportunity came.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We stayed three nights at this location. Clean, comfy, wonderful staff. We had one issue but they fixed in asap. We would stay here again!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Safe, clean, quiet, comfortable. Not very inviting lobby with outdated decor, wish they would renovate this part. Front desk staff is very helpful, maintenance less so. Asked if we could have a refrigerator in our room. Were told that only the King Suites have this feature but that maintenance could put one in our standard room anyway. We asked twice more since it took so long. When we got back four hours later they had given us the oldest mini fridge they could find, but at least it worked. I guess we're getting spoiled at the Fairfield Inns! Didn't try the breakfast since it's not included in the price. No frills business hotel, recommended if this is your purpose, otherwise avoid. Rooms have enough space for you, your luggage, a desk and the TV (which is not 32" in all rooms,
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Very enjoyable stay.....lost my wallet, Lucia ( manager ) found it and returned it to me intact! Also left my phone charger behind ( I lose stuff ) and she called to tell me and then sent it back!  Thats the kind of service you want from a hotel staff....going the extra mile.  Thank you Lucia and Marriott !
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: If you have business in Cypress or nearby towns, the Courtyard Marriott is a good choice. Easy to find, clean, free wi-fi (why don't all hotels have this!), decent breakfast - all positives for this location. It's about 15 minutes from the Long Beach Airport, and was also very close to Knotts Berry for family travelers.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Newly renovated, this hotel is a great option
Summary: This hotel has always been my hotel of choice in Cypress, but the recent renovations and the wireless upgrade make it the only option here now.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Hotel was conveniently located for my travel purposes.  This hotel is very clean, has a wonderful staff, it was just a wonderful stay all the way around.  I loved the room!  The bed was so comfortable, and the bathroom is large and roomy.  My only problem, no fault of the hotel or staff, was the second night I stayed, some occupants in one of the other rooms close to me, decided that they would bypass CA law and the hotel's, and smoke cigarretes in their room.  Recipe for a headache and to flare up my asthma a bit.  I do hope the hotel was able to find out which room was the offending room and charge those people an extra $250.00 to get rid of that smell.  Glad they stayed on top of it.  Thank you, Denise!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Stayed at the Courtyard Cypress for 2 nights. The Hotel is in a nice, clean and safe area - mainly business. Conveinent to Knotts Berry Farm and Disney. Not too far from the beaches. Nice pool and whirlpool with a good view of the mountains
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We really appreciate you bringing this to our attention as we are always looking for ways to provide the best possible experience for our guests. We hope to see you in the future and earn that perfect score!

Summary: I stayed here as I traveled to watch my daughter play a college basketball tournament at Cypress College.  The college was 5-10 minutes away, as is Disneyland (just down the street).  You need a car if you want to go to Disneyland and you'll have to pay for parking there.  Beaches are also nearby.  Great location.  There is plenty of parking at this hotel.  The room was clean and comfortable and there are a couple of strip malls within walking distance for casual dining and shopping.  I also felt that it was safe enough to walk the neighboring streets.  I didn't eat at the hotel but may next time.  This may not be the highest rated hotel in Cypress but I am very comfortable recommending it based on my past trip, as well as the Marriott and Cortyard names.  I will likely stay
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: This a great hotel and worth every penny.  My 12 year old daughter and I stayed at the hotel for the weekend. but on the second and last day of our stay, my daughter and I had some very bad luck.  The water pump and timing belt to our car saw its last day. After our car was towed, I was told it could be repaired for $800 and completed in about 6-7 hours.  I called the hotel and explained the situation. I told the hotel staff that my belongings were still inside the room, but my car would not be repaired until 6 p.m.  The hotel was extremely understanding and said they would not charge me for the VERY late checkout.  This may not be the fanciest hotel, but the staff is second to none.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to rite such a nice review in Trip Advisors.   I am so sorry to hear you had problems with your car. Such an awful way to end a great vacation.  Please let me know if you are coming back to visit. I would love to treat you and your daughter to breakfast.    Kindest Regards,  Sally Brayton

Summary: I have stayed her before and I am very pleased that the management and staff continue to work hard to make this property even more pleasant and easy to stay.   . They truly HAVE made the back entrance a lot nicer.  Parking lot is well maintained; plenty of lighting and very attractive gardening. . Breakfast was pretty good and certainly convenient and a decent value.  In fact, that describes the entire hotel -- it's not spectacular but it's a very dependable, enjoyable stay, especially for the fair price.  Truly, what I like best about Courtyard. . Oh, and if you like Mexican food, try the El Torrito 150 ft. away -- Fantastic place.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice review in Trip Advisor. I am pleased you enjoyed your stay.   We do have a different landscaper  and it is nice that you noticed the change.   Unfortunately most of the lighting in the back belongs to our neighbor, Office Max and we have no control over the timer so there are times the lights shut off too early!  Please let me know if you are visiting us again soon. I would like to treat you to breakfast!  Best Regards,  Sally Brayton  Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great hotel, clean, quiet and comfortable
Summary: My fianc√© and i stayed at this hotel for 4 nights. We loved it! The staff was very helpful and friendly anytime we needed anything. The room was spotless and the bed was very comfortable. We had plenty of pillows and towels. The shower had strong water pressure, and the shower/bath combo seemed to be larger than it is in most hotels. The room was extremely quiet! We didn't even know we had neighbors until we saw them in the hall. The pool and hot tub were great. The pool was heated to a comfortable level. Out of the 3 nights we went down to the pool, there was only other people down there one time. We never used the fitness center, but it looked very nice as well. We put our do not disturb sign on the door the first few days because we had plenty of towels and didn't need anyone
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Standard Courtyard quality; often at a very good price.
Summary: Although I have never been "Wow'd" by the experience here, I have stayed here 3 times (5 nites), so I thought I should include it in my reviews.  Bottom-line, is that this hotel delivers as almost every other Courtyard does, and the rates that I've received have been very competitive. . My company's HQ is in Long Beach, about 7 miles west of Cypress, CA and the Katella / Valley View intersection where this property is located.  Not so far on the 405 or surface streets to rule out staying here when the full-service Marriott by LGB airport is $120/nite + internet more.  Plus, the El Torrito's next door satisfies the craving for typical Tex-Mex, very nicely.  Walgreen's and Von's nearby mean that as long as one has a car, inexpensive items are convenient. . Check-in and front-desk
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: Real easy stay. No complications. The hotel was clean, no smell. The rooms were really nice. Beds were perfect... pillows easy to sleep on.. and we bothered the hell out of the front desk. One downside is they're not very knowledgeable about the local area. We asked a few people about local tapioca shops and some other touristy things... they had no clue. Overall it was an excellent stay. We weren't there as tourists... just to visit a family. It's situation between two freeways.. about 7 minutes in each direction.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review.   We work extremely hard to ensure that our guests enjoy their stay with us.  You may be pleased to know  the back parking lot adjacent to us and owned and by our neighbors has now been "cleaned up".

Summary: Stayed at the Courtyard Cypress for 2 nights. We got a great AAA rate (USD 75,-!!!) because we had booked weeks in advance. The Hotel is in a nice, clean and safe area - mainly business but also some housing areas within a few minutes drive.  Nice lobby where you can have free coffee & tea and watch TV on a big plasma screen.  Our room was nice & simple with two beds, TV, A/C (which was quite loud though-the only negative side to our stay) and a bathroom with bathtub, shower & toilet. We were 4 people and had just enough space for us and our suitcases and other stuff. Had breakfast at the Hotel once and can really recommend it - good choice of everything one can ask for! We all have different tastes and some like superhealthy stuff (ie fruits & oatmeal), others eggs & bacon etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: I Wouldn't Stay Any Where Else!
Summary: Courtyard Marriott Hotel in Cypress is the best place to stay. I'm a single lady and always feel safe and well taken care of. The staff is outstanding..the rooms clean and wonderful. It's 'home away from home' for me.  The restaurant serves breakfast and dinner and the food is delicious. I had an event catered there and everyone was so pleased we are going back next year!  Sharon Howard Fallbrook, CA
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: We stayed here for a last minute Disney trip. Perfect choice. Rates are substancially lower than the Marriotts around Disney. Hotel is a seven mile straight shot down Katella from Disney. Easy 10-15 minutes to and from the park each day. We had an upper floor and could actually see the fireworks show from Disney. Several restaurants within a mile of hotel. What sets this Courtyard above others is the resaurant and bar that are off the lobby.  It's nothing fancy, but it was nice to have a drink at the end of the day without leaving the hotel.  A nice amentiy at this price point. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon and earn that perfect score.

Summary: I have stayed at this property many times over the past 6 years. It is easy to get to and is usually clean.  NOT this time, the shower was dirty and the room smelled moldy,  we cut our stay short and left a day early.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We really appreciate you bringing this to our attention as we are always looking for ways to provide the best possible experience for our guests. We hope to see you in the future and earn that perfect score!

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel several times over the last few years & it is extremely consistent.  They have a small bar and a restaurant which serves bfast and dinner.   The rooms are freshly decorated and the suites are very nice.  I would recommend this hotel to business travelers in the area!

Summary Heading: A very nice hotel with proximity to Disney
Summary: My husband, six year old and I stayed here on a package deal through Marriott with Disney twilight tickets. The hotel is about 8 miles (a straight shot) from Disney.   The room was clean and spacious with free internet and parking. The staff were very prompt and helpful.  The complaints I had are their cheap white towels, breakfast was decent but could have been warmer. They do make waffles, pancakes and french toast on request! Good selection just needed to be warmer (including the coffee). The hot tub also was not functioning properly so it was cold.   All in all I would definitely consider staying here again for a Disney trip.
